story:
Mission: Heli-Ski Saddleback Mountain:

**We are no longer using the Indiegogo portal to book the Helicopter skiing events! See www.heli-bear.com to book the ride of your life.

We aim to sell 20 tickets to Event #1 and make it happen

And separately, 20 tickects for the StormChaser's Event #1

We're leaving the Indiegogo campaign up for additional info. Enjoy and Like us on FB www.facebook.com/northeasthelibear


With your support these 2 events can come true at Saddleback Mtn. and be the dawn of a new era for skiing in the East! You'll deliver the social proof and financial means to bring this epic future of Heli-Skiing mountains throughout Maine, New Hampshire, Vermont, and New York to life and help pioneer new terrain all across the map. This is gonna be huge, its time to chart new territory together!


This is all or nothing funding, please: "Help get the Bear in Air!" Helicopter skiing in the East may never be possible for you, your skier friends, and our future generations, if we can't reach the goal together. Let's make this happen and create history! Donate what you can or grab a cool reward. Buy a heli-skiing experience now to lift us off the ground, which will allow you to participate in either of our first two events OR to redeem your ticket in the future. Opt in or Out of prescheduled future events or wait for the perfect storm to ride after. Learn more below and thank you, thank you, thank you for your support!

-Tom Massey , Family, Friends, and the


Event #1: Heli-ski Saddleback Ski Mountain in Rangeley, Maine with a 206B Jet Ranger Helicopter on March 7th. with 19 other guests for the first ever helicopter assisted skiing event in the Northeast. Using Saddleback Ski Resort's open peaks, man-made terrain, groomed trails, and natural glades you can experience this once-in-a-lifetime experience affordably and intermediate through expert skill levels will feel in heaven. By donating $500 through Indiegogo, you buy yourself, a friend, or family member a ticket for March 7th OR it can be redeemed in the future for any of our prescheduled flights through 2025. Buying a ticket through Indiegogo saves you $200 off our website's price.

   

Event #2: Heli-ski Saddleback Mountain directly after a snow storm resulting in more than 6" of fresh snow, as a test run for the StormChaser's PowderBird Club, which gives you and 19 other advanced and expert mountain riders the epic opportunity to rip Saddleback's powder fields and amazing Casablanca glade and chute system without lift lines, losing time riding the lift, and having to hike up into the powder fields. This is sure to go down in East Coast skiing history, you gotta be part of lifting this out of dreams and into reality! We'll fly you the first snow storm in March with 6" or more! By donating $1000 through Indiegogo you buy yourself, a friend, or family member a seat for the first storm in March OR it can be redeemed in the future for any of our StormChaser's Club outings through 2025, as we add uncharted terrain. Buying a ticket through Indiegogo saves you $200 off our website's price.

 


Details:

In order to be on the dawn of bringing this experience into your life, we have so gratefully received the green light from Saddleback's GM Chris Farmer to fly the whirlybird for these pilot events and Maine Helicopters Inc.'s Jim McCully is answering the call with their 5-seat 206B Jet Ranger out of Whitefield, ME. We couldn't be more ecstatic to bring this to you guys! Jim Chalmers of Chalmers Insurance Group, has provided all the right insurance to ensure a safe, sound, and covered operation, while Andrew Zulieve of Zulieve Law in Waldoboro has tipped his hat to the operation, after a legal review and setting up the S-Corp.

Future:

Our discussions with logging companies to drop you on top of their high peaks, long steep logging trails, open clear-cuts which make for amazing powder fields, and other natural skiable features will be realized with your help and make for unbelievably diverse terrain. Do you want to claim a first descent in Maine or the Northeast?! Get onboard!

   


Take action, donate $500 or more and get your spot on the chopper saved, its good through 2025. But please do it now, if we don't reach the all or nothing goal, heli-skiing in the East may never be possible for anyone. Land preserves, State Parks, and private landowners are open to us skiing their prime winter parcels if we get the funding together. We are in the midst of organizing additional unique events such as helicopter vineyard & winery tours, heli-mountain biking, heli-hiking, paintball expeditions, lighthouse and island tours, & heli-golf to name a few. The sky is the limit. By 2030 let's plan to ski the moon! LOL!

     


Commitment to Community and World Affairs:

As we aim to leverage the amazing feats a helicopter can perform for skiing, we realize there is another critical task in our communities where a helicopter can change lives. By donating 5% of our profits to Lifeflight of Maine, their "vision for Maine as a place in which every person, in every community, has access to critical care and medical transport when they need it," can be further realized and supported. LifeFlight helicopters, flying at 165 miles per hour, bring lifesaving critical care directly to people in Maine when they need it most. Help us help them, fly strong.

        

 

Many are unaware that the worst humanitarian disaster in recent history is occurring in Syria, with virtually no assistance from the outside world. Recognizing the atrocities and utter lack of aid, Alison McKellar, my best friend, tech support, and mother of my son Colton, has partnered with the amazing NuDay Syria,
to collect food, winter clothing, medical supplies, tarps, and used boat shrink wrap for shelters. They organize, pack, and pay to send shipping containers to the most destitute places within Syria, something Red Cross is barely able to do. 5% of our profits will help Alison and NuDay Syria's commitment to delivering aid to Syrian refugee camps.

Risks and challenges

By using Saddleback's ski trails to pilot this mission, we have taken out a lot of the risks and challenges of delivering you and your mates an epic experience with high quality, safe terrain, though realize that weather can be unpredictable and effect our ability to fly. If, we have weather issues on the scheduled March 7th. inaugural flight, we will give you a free voucher to ski Saddleback using their lifts that day and aim to execute the heli-ski, the next day March 8th. Saturday, March 14th would be next. The second event is directly related to the weather, as we await and build extra excitement leading up to a beautiful snow storm, clear skies that follow, and incredible conditions with heli-access. Don't delay, please contribute to this campaign, and bring heli-skiing home. Again this all or nothing!

Of the $35,000 we are raising $20,000 will go to mobilizing, flying, fueling, and providing the 206B Jet Ranger helicopter for two days of heli-skiing. $5,000 for insuring the events, $2,500 for marketing, filming, IT, web support, and Go Pro cameras, $2,500 for Indiegogo and credit card processor's fees, and $5,000 to lease and develop new, previously un-skiable terrain.

So, we've covered the place to do it, the helicopter, insurance, legal review and truly feel we have a live one here and are ready to rock and roll with you. Now we need to let your passion for skiing and your financial muscle flex by chipping in and helping climb this Heli-Bear into the Air!

Thank you for your Love and Support!!


Very Special Thank you's:
Saddleback Mountain Resort and GM Chris Farmer for pioneering with us
Dan Hickman, for the gorgeous helicopter footage of Saddleback
Jim McCully and Maine Helicopters Inc. for flying the vision
Kristen McKellar, technologist and teammate extraordinaire
Bill Ryan and Ryan Financial Services for their consulting and financial support
Andrew and Holly Zulieve of Zulieve Law
Jim Chalmers of Chalmers Insurance Group
Jared Emerson, Operations Manager at Saddleback for his input and coordination
Alison McKellar and Vincent Jones for their love and support
Our boys, Colton and Mason, for inspiration and the precious lenses of a child's eye
Mom, for the Love and adventurous spirit. As she rides around the world solo on her motorcycle, we ride with you Mom and you with us.
Dad, for the omnipresent support and entrepreneurial spirit.
Laura Gertner, for life enrichment, amazing cooking, & eternal friendship.
Lewis Howes, Timothy Ferris, Derek Halpern, Marie Forleo, Frank Bettger, and Brendon Burchard for their coaching and fueling the drive to bring this to the world.
And to the rest of my family, friends, brothers, clients, and pets that have been listening to and supporting this mission for a few years now, Thank you and Bless your hearts! Let's finally fly together!


"The helicopter approaches closer than any other vehicle to fulfillment of mankind's ancient dreams of the flying horse and the magic carpet." 

-Igor Sikorsky
story_txt:
Mission: Heli-Ski Saddleback Mountain:
**We are no longer using the Indiegogo portal to book the Helicopter skiing events! See www.heli-bear.com to book the ride of your life.
We aim to sell 20 tickets to Event #1 and make it happen
And separately, 20 tickects for the StormChaser's Event #1
We're leaving the Indiegogo campaign up for additional info. Enjoy and Like us on FB www.facebook.com/northeasthelibear


With your support these 2 events can come true at Saddleback Mtn. and be the dawn of a new era for skiing in the East! You'll deliver the social proof and financial means to bring this epic future of Heli-Skiing mountains throughout Maine, New Hampshire, Vermont, and New York to life and help pioneer new terrain all across the map. This is gonna be huge, its time to chart new territory together!



This is all or nothing funding, please: "Help get the Bear in Air!" Helicopter skiing in the East may never be possible for you, your skier friends, and our future generations, if we can't reach the goal together. Let's make this happen and create history! Donate what you can or grab a cool reward. Buy a heli-skiing experience now to lift us off the ground, which will allow you to participate in either of our first two events OR to redeem your ticket in the future. Opt in or Out of prescheduled future events or wait for the perfect storm to ride after. Learn more below and thank you, thank you, thank you for your support!
-Tom Massey , Family, Friends, and the

Event #1: Heli-ski Saddleback Ski Mountain in Rangeley, Maine with a 206B Jet Ranger Helicopter on March 7th. with 19 other guests for the first ever helicopter assisted skiing event in the Northeast. Using Saddleback Ski Resort's open peaks, man-made terrain, groomed trails, and natural glades you can experience this once-in-a-lifetime experience affordably and intermediate through expert skill levels will feel in heaven. By donating $500 through Indiegogo, you buy yourself, a friend, or family member a ticket for March 7th OR it can be redeemed in the future for any of our prescheduled flights through 2025. Buying a ticket through Indiegogo saves you $200 off our website's price.



   
Event #2: Heli-ski Saddleback Mountain directly after a snow storm resulting in more than 6" of fresh snow, as a test run for the StormChaser's PowderBird Club, which gives you and 19 other advanced and expert mountain riders the epic opportunity to rip Saddleback's powder fields and amazing Casablanca glade and chute system without lift lines, losing time riding the lift, and having to hike up into the powder fields. This is sure to go down in East Coast skiing history, you gotta be part of lifting this out of dreams and into reality! We'll fly you the first snow storm in March with 6" or more! By donating $1000 through Indiegogo you buy yourself, a friend, or family member a seat for the first storm in March OR it can be redeemed in the future for any of our StormChaser's Club outings through 2025, as we add uncharted terrain. Buying a ticket through Indiegogo saves you $200 off our website's price.


 

Details:
In order to be on the dawn of bringing this experience into your life, we have so gratefully received the green light from Saddleback's GM Chris Farmer to fly the whirlybird for these pilot events and Maine Helicopters Inc.'s Jim McCully is answering the call with their 5-seat 206B Jet Ranger out of Whitefield, ME. We couldn't be more ecstatic to bring this to you guys! Jim Chalmers of Chalmers Insurance Group, has provided all the right insurance to ensure a safe, sound, and covered operation, while Andrew Zulieve of Zulieve Law in Waldoboro has tipped his hat to the operation, after a legal review and setting up the S-Corp.
Future:
Our discussions with logging companies to drop you on top of their high peaks, long steep logging trails, open clear-cuts which make for amazing powder fields, and other natural skiable features will be realized with your help and make for unbelievably diverse terrain. Do you want to claim a first descent in Maine or the Northeast?! Get onboard!

   
Take action, donate $500 or more and get your spot on the chopper saved, its good through 2025. But please do it now, if we don't reach the all or nothing goal, heli-skiing in the East may never be possible for anyone. Land preserves, State Parks, and private landowners are open to us skiing their prime winter parcels if we get the funding together. We are in the midst of organizing additional unique events such as helicopter vineyard & winery tours, heli-mountain biking, heli-hiking, paintball expeditions, lighthouse and island tours, & heli-golf to name a few. The sky is the limit. By 2030 let's plan to ski the moon! LOL!


     

Commitment to Community and World Affairs:
As we aim to leverage the amazing feats a helicopter can perform for skiing, we realize there is another critical task in our communities where a helicopter can change lives. By donating 5% of our profits to Lifeflight of Maine, their "vision for Maine as a place in which every person, in every community, has access to critical care and medical transport when they need it," can be further realized and supported. LifeFlight helicopters, flying at 165 miles per hour, bring lifesaving critical care directly to people in Maine when they need it most. Help us help them, fly strong.

        

 

Many are unaware that the worst humanitarian disaster in recent history is occurring in Syria, with virtually no assistance from the outside world. Recognizing the atrocities and utter lack of aid, Alison McKellar, my best friend, tech support, and mother of my son Colton, has partnered with the amazing NuDay Syria, to collect food, winter clothing, medical supplies, tarps, and used boat shrink wrap for shelters. They organize, pack, and pay to send shipping containers to the most destitute places within Syria, something Red Cross is barely able to do. 5% of our profits will help Alison and NuDay Syria's commitment to delivering aid to Syrian refugee camps.
Risks and challengesBy using Saddleback's ski trails to pilot this mission, we have taken out a lot of the risks and challenges of delivering you and your mates an epic experience with high quality, safe terrain, though realize that weather can be unpredictable and effect our ability to fly. If, we have weather issues on the scheduled March 7th. inaugural flight, we will give you a free voucher to ski Saddleback using their lifts that day and aim to execute the heli-ski, the next day March 8th. Saturday, March 14th would be next. The second event is directly related to the weather, as we await and build extra excitement leading up to a beautiful snow storm, clear skies that follow, and incredible conditions with heli-access. Don't delay, please contribute to this campaign, and bring heli-skiing home. Again this all or nothing!Of the $35,000 we are raising $20,000 will go to mobilizing, flying, fueling, and providing the 206B Jet Ranger helicopter for two days of heli-skiing. $5,000 for insuring the events, $2,500 for marketing, filming, IT, web support, and Go Pro cameras, $2,500 for Indiegogo and credit card processor's fees, and $5,000 to lease and develop new, previously un-skiable terrain.So, we've covered the place to do it, the helicopter, insurance, legal review and truly feel we have a live one here and are ready to rock and roll with you. Now we need to let your passion for skiing and your financial muscle flex by chipping in and helping climb this Heli-Bear into the Air!Thank you for your Love and Support!!Very Special Thank you's:Saddleback Mountain Resort and GM Chris Farmer for pioneering with usDan Hickman, for the gorgeous helicopter footage of SaddlebackJim McCully and Maine Helicopters Inc. for flying the visionKristen McKellar, technologist and teammate extraordinaireBill Ryan and Ryan Financial Services for their consulting and financial supportAndrew and Holly Zulieve of Zulieve LawJim Chalmers of Chalmers Insurance GroupJared Emerson, Operations Manager at Saddleback for his input and coordinationAlison McKellar and Vincent Jones for their love and supportOur boys, Colton and Mason, for inspiration and the precious lenses of a child's eyeMom, for the Love and adventurous spirit. As she rides around the world solo on her motorcycle, we ride with you Mom and you with us.Dad, for the omnipresent support and entrepreneurial spirit.Laura Gertner, for life enrichment, amazing cooking, & eternal friendship.Lewis Howes, Timothy Ferris, Derek Halpern, Marie Forleo, Frank Bettger, and Brendon Burchard for their coaching and fueling the drive to bring this to the world.And to the rest of my family, friends, brothers, clients, and pets that have been listening to and supporting this mission for a few years now, Thank you and Bless your hearts! Let's finally fly together!
"The helicopter approaches closer than any other vehicle to fulfillment of mankind's ancient dreams of the flying horse and the magic carpet." 
-Igor Sikorsky

story:
I have just been accepted into the English Opens Doors Volunteer Program (EODP) Initiative of the Ministry of Education and the United Nations Development Program–Chile as a volunteer English teacher for a period of four months (August - November, 2016). I'm incredibly excited to have a chance to give back!

The funding for my campaign will enable me to travel and fulfill my volunteer commitment as an English teacher, which I have now accepted. I will be fulfilling my volunteer responsibilities to 300 children in rural Chile and my host community, who are now awaiting my arrival.

It would be very difficult for the EODP to replace me due to time and visa constraints, if I am unable to achieve my campaign funding objective which means I would be depriving a school community (≈300 students) of working with a volunteer in 2016.

Your support is highly valued and will go a long way to touch a Chilean child in a positive way.

I greatly appreciate any donation you'd be willing to make. Large or small, it will help make a direct impact on the youth in Chile. And even if you can't donate, you can still support my cause by sharing my fundraising page with your family and friends using the Indiegogo share tools.

The English Opens Doors Volunteer Program is a national initiative that was created in 2004 to help support the improvement of English language learning and teaching in the Chilean public school system. Throughout this time, the Program has had more than 2,100 volunteers participate in the volunteer initiative, and has positively benefited the lives of hundreds of thousands of Chilean students.


As a volunteer English language teaching assistant, I will have the unique opportunity to be a part of an important and exciting educational initiative in Chile.
I have no doubt that my previous experience, education, and strong motivation will make me a successful volunteer. 


Your donations will help me cover the following expenses: 

  1. Air travel expenses to and from Chile
  2. Local transportation expenses for my period of stay in my host community
  3. Living expenses
  4. Purchase of little rewards for my students for good performance to encourage them and to stimulate learning 
  5. Teaching materials

Thank you once again and immensely for your kind support!

story:
(https://appbajar.com)   

Business & Commerce

Winner of mBillionth2016 In South Asia region

Started: 03 February 2016

Registered User: 10,001

Approved App: 1510

Facebook page like: 48,000

Vision: Value the creativity.

Team behind the initiative

We, ‪Advanced Apps Bangladesh (AAPBD), http://aapbd.com,‬  is STARTUP maker! We mainly work on Native Apps/Web admin/API solutions for STARTUP and make their BASE so that they can move from there easily. Developed more than 400 native apps on Android and iOS platform for global clients where 90% were from the USA.

 

What is AppBajar?

 

  • (https://appbajar.com) is a B2C Digital content marketplace and social communication tool for customers and content creators.
  • Focuses on Android Apps, Books and Music.
  • A platform which gained an incredible good position in Bangladesh IT industry in no time after launching a full journey from February 03, 2016
  • Currently AppBajar is hosting more than 1510 Android apps and more than 10,000 registered customers.
  • Winner of #mBillionth2016 under business and commerce category over South Asia. http://mbillionth.in/business-commerce-winners-...

Why is AppBajar?

 

  • In Bangladesh and few other countries, Google play merchant account isn’t available, hence people can’t sell Android apps.
  • It’s hard for people to create an account/ buy Android apps using international currencies from Bangladesh.
  • In Bangladesh, there’s no good platform to sell music and ebooks. Copyright violation is a major issue here.
  • There are several countries where Google play service is banned, so people can’t use Google play.
  • is the one stop solution to overcome those issues with the vision- “VALUE THE CREATIVITY”

 

Uniqueness of AppBajar

  • Free digital content upload, paid content download/use.
  • Own wallet system for recharge worldwide. It allows all kinds of debit credit cards, internet banking, mobile banking.
  • Portfolio development for career.
  • Introducing AppBajarian (Social networking features)
  • Phone number based registration to bypass email address based complex registration.
  • No dependency on Google play services to access from more android device.

 

Opportunity

  • Emerging market of  62.004 million internet subscriber at the end of April 2016 of Bangladesh.
  • Usability of digital contents, mobilization of works.
  • Enabling more opportunities for underprivileged people to develop their Education and health knowledge base.  
  • World-wide accessibility and we have an unlimited number of potential users who can get benefit through AppBajar.
  • Government emphasis on Digitalization.

 

Technology

  • Hardware: Android Smartphone (from 4.0 OS) and Computer/Phone with Internet.
  •            Software: Android OS, Any browser from Computer/Phone.
  •            Web: www.appbajar.com
  •             AppBajar App: www.appbajar.com/en/our-app

Business Model

  • Direct Sell Model - All apps are paid. Price will be started from 1 BDT (1 POINT).
  • Subscription based payment.
  • Sponsored App Payment.

Major Challenges

  • Lack of 3G/high speed internet at villages.
  • Lack of Easy payment system. Mobile balance would be standard for those sort of product/E-commerce.
  • Less education and technical knowledge of target user.
  • Lack of significant fund to expand marketing promotions to reach end users.

 

THANK YOU

MD Shafiul Alam Biplob

Founder and Visionary of AppBajar

story:
THC-ience Book!

Everything you wanted to know about cannabis but didn't have a lab to find out--in one nifty (and pretty darn sweet) book.  

Get a MMJ SCIENCE BOOK and CANNA-BI-KNOW the facts. Topics include:

  • How much THC is left in my stems? How about other reclaims?
  • Ways to consume; (smoke, edible, vape, oils, tinctures)
  • How does my strain stack up - potency statistics!
  • Sativa or Indica: what's more potent? What's the difference?
  • How many licks to the center of a canna-Lollipop? Mr. Owl? 
  • What we know about bioavailability.

Check out the Perks--you can even submit your own questions.  

Fact vs Fiction: It's up to YOU to help us prove your friends wrong.

What We Need & What You Get

This book is the first of its kind! We think it's high time for a data-driven cannabis science book, read along with us. Get your hands on a copy for troubleshooting your general inquiries.

Cannabis and Comics make science sexy again.  We want to pack as much science between the pages as possible.  We teamed up with artists and graphic designers to translate our nerd science into something you'd actually enjoy thumbing through.  

 In return for your support, you will get some sweet science along with nerd perks including:

A scientist-approved pocket protector sticker.  Wear it with a bow-tie for extra credit!  Science is cool, remember?  

Geek-chic t-shirt.  Flaunt your love of cannabis science.  We do!  

This.  A simple statement of your support.  Tell everyone behind you.  EVERYONE.

The Impact

Deep in an underground volcano Lab, scientists work tirelessly analyzing samples to make ground-breaking discoveries. This data is generations (in plant years) worth of info for your needy eye-holes to soak in. We will provide oodles of facts to thumb through for hours--impress a date or be a boss at trivia night. Let your mind take breaks during the reading with fun comic strips.

Join the cannabis revolution: Become a science foot-soldier today! Keep informed and pass the knowledge to the left side man. You don't need to sift through white paper journalism prints, enjoy cool art and graphs. Help transform society with science. SCIENCE!

  • Science separates fact from fiction. This is a book of facts!
  • This book translates MCR Labs' impeccable science into a language we all understand and like
  • Satisfy your stoner craving for facts (not just snacks)
  • This is privately funded research so no government strings to hold us up
  • Science and facts can change policy - arm yourself with the tools to change our world

Risks & Challenges

Although MCR Labs has a great track record of finding fact, science can be risky: results don't always come out as expected. Science is hard, but we got this. We have been working in the industry of science and cannabis for decades, and we're smart enough to team up with fantastic sketchy sketch artists.  

The lab is a super intense place where we deal with crazy cool scientific stuff that could blow off clouds of smoke at any moment. It's a challenge to keep these scientists well-rested and fed to keep them alert and on their game.  We are sciencing our way through the legal grey zones to bring you the best science to help change policy.  



 

We are taking a risk by studying something taboo and mildly illegal, but we are up to the challenge. We're the Copernicus of Cannabis.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Tell everyone. Spread our cause on social media.  Make a push for cannabis science.  
  • Visit @MCRLabs on instagram and find some cool information for free.
  • Bring your strain in to be tested at MCR labs and help grow our data pool.

story:
Help me raise funds to build the Dr Olivet Buck memorial Sewing and Fashion academy and studio in Sierra Leone. The first ever international sewing school and production studio that will teach and train local sierra Leonean’s, young and old and of all privileges in both traditional and international sewing and garment manufacture, setting them up with lifelong skills that they can utilise to support themselves and ethically placing west Africa on the booming fashion manufacture market creating jobs, inspiring others and motivating growth.

 

ABOUT THE PROJECT.

This is a project taken on by designer Euphemia-Ann to build and set up the very first international sewing school and small scale production factory in Freetown Sierra Leone to do her part in giving back and rebuilding a country broken by War and Ebola. Life after Ebola is unimaginable for most of us but the reality for so many. Believing we can all make a difference no matter our career paths, this project is one little woman's way to do what she can. Anything with effort and passion can be ethical, including fashion. It's not just about clothing and looking great, its about changing lives and leaving behind a positive footprint to guide and inspire others.

 

A LITTLE ABOUT THE FOUNDER AND SYDNEY-DAVIES 

Euphemia Sydney-Davies is a Sierra Leonean born founder and designer at Sydney-Davies London which is a fairly new independent fashion label specialising in both Womenwear and Menswear characterised by statement and fashion forward pieces, bold un-afraid colour and beautifully crafted and alternative fabrics. The label was born in 2013 shortly after completing a fashion degree course in Scotland, internship and training at Alexander McQueen and further fashion business studies at Central Saint Martins. Growing up in the East Side of Freetown, Sierra Leone until the age of 13 when she and her mother fled Sierra Leone as refugees soon after the end of the rebel invasion during the brutal civil war, she has held a great zeal for life, and an eternal optimist.

Her experiences in Sierra Leone had a phenomenal impact on her personal and professional life. Since leaving Sierra Leone as a young child she was overcome with the need to somehow give something back to a land she feels as proud to be a citizen of as frustrated by the neglect and regular and systematic demoralisation of the image and capabilities of Africa and Africans in main stream media. 

"I have lived with the deepest urge to go and give back to Sierra Leone and find a way to inspire and develop my country."

 

 

HOW THE PROJECT WAS BORN.

As a small start-up fashion business with limited finance, she faced and still does the struggle most other similar businesses do with regards to the small scale production of her clothing. A lot of businesses in the fashion and clothing industry need production and due to cost, availability and quantities, seek production abroad in places like India and China. This led her to a eureka moment as she thought, why not Sierra Leone? Why not Africa, where there is an abundance of skill and will.

This led Euphemia to the decision to seek manufacture of her labels clothing in Sierra Leone. Taking the leap of faith, she purchased a handful of sewing machines and studio equipment to be shipped to Freetown. Everything had been packed and on its way on a shipping boat when the Ebola disaster broke out, something that affected her family on a personal level as she lost her Aunt Dr Olivet Buck named the 4th doctor to die from the epidemic. After waiting nearly 2 years to get the go ahead and for Sierra Leone to be declared Ebola free, Euphemia travelled back to Freetown earlier this year for 5 weeks where she worked with 7 local men and women (from some to no experience in garment making) in studios in Regent and Waterloo. They were well paid above the national living wage yet was also very affordable for a small business like hers. This trip was initially limited to Euphemia and her clothing line.

With recent disastrous events in 3rd world factories and the rife of despicable, abusive and inhumane working conditions, I am somewhat discouraged in seeking production of my products in places where I am unable to really monitor activities or gain accurate and truthful feedback on how my clothing is produced. I'm not just interested in a quick fix or just getting products made cheaply. I'd rather put in the work and time to responsibly sources production. I refuse to enlist the services of factories unless I have personally visited them and it is this very reason I only produce my own pieces, and source production here in the UK where possible, and the main factor in the birth of my sewing school project and factory in Sierra Leone. Instead of spending time and money travelling miles away I had a eureka moment and thought why not set something up myself. Something in a land that's dear to me, a place largely avoided by the fashion industry although the skill, need and most of all Will are plenty, and something that would help change not only my life but the lives of many and a place I can monitor and ensure quality and. I understand the culture, traditions, language and the people and I would be a secure source of garment manufacture for other small business as the project grows providing them with confidence and security in knowing not only are they gaining affordable production but ethically too. 

However upon her return to London she felt there was potential for a lot more to be done. Following a proposal to the Canterbury of West Africa, she has been granted permission and land space to build her dreams, gaining the approval and support of the largest church in West Africa and will be working in conjunction with them. This would be the first international sewing school and production studio of its scale in Sierra Leone and will not only provide jobs for local people, but take in young people, teaching and educating them in garment construction, giving them a lifelong skill they can use to support themselves when they move on from the school.

‘I am well trained and confident I bear the skills and discipline to impart lifelong skills, inspire and motivate young and old, supporting them where possible with their own sewing machines and setting them on a path to work and income security.’

 

SHORT TERM DEVELOPMENT

The money we are hoping to raise will go towards building the school from ground up and equipping it with, chairs, tables, fashion studio schooling equipment, sewing machines, computers, educational material, maintenance and the general running of the academy for the first 3 years. Taking in a handful of young and able local men and women including the 7 she’s already worked earlier this year, to work closely with Euphemia over a period of time as they train and learn skills in garment construction and tailoring to suit both our traditional and main stream (western) styles.

 

 

LONG TERM DEVELOPMENT/PROSPECTS

Once their training is complete we will then open the school to the general public. These trainees will then be appointed as teachers and technicians.  Everything and everyone will be closely mentored and monitored by my Euphemia herself and team. During their time, they will learn and develop key skills in tailoring and garment construction. There is also the job opportunity for some students to stay on and work with us as staff, in turn providing them with a sustainable source of income. Following on from this, I then plan to extend our services to other designers both local and in Sierra Leone, and abroad to have their clothing stock produced at the school by our staff and students. This will bring in the necessary funds to help run and keep the school (after the first 3 years) whilst placing Sierra Leone on the fashion map and opening the way for trade and development. 

The progress of the project from building to set-up to the school opening will be documented and shared with the public on our page, website and social media so you can all see what's going on. 

This the first step to making this project a reality and my drop in very large ocean. without your backing there is no project. I really hope you'd be able to give as little or as much as you can. You are appreciated! Please do feel free to get in touch with me should you have any questions, suggestions or would just like to know more. Thank you so so so very much for your support. 

BE PART OF AN ICONIC MOVEMENT TO MAKE THE WORLD A BETTER PLACE.

                                                                                                                                        Thank you, Love ESD x
story_txt: Help me raise funds to build the Dr Olivet Buck memorial Sewing and Fashion academy and studio in Sierra Leone. The first ever international sewing school and production studio that will teach and train local sierra Leonean’s, young and old and of all privileges in both traditional and international sewing and garment manufacture, setting them up with lifelong skills that they can utilise to support themselves and ethically placing west Africa on the booming fashion manufacture market creating jobs, inspiring others and motivating growth. ABOUT THE PROJECT.This is a project taken on by designer Euphemia-Ann to build and set up the very first international sewing school and small scale production factory in Freetown Sierra Leone to do her part in giving back and rebuilding a country broken by War and Ebola. Life after Ebola is unimaginable for most of us but the reality for so many. Believing we can all make a difference no matter our career paths, this project is one little woman's way to do what she can. Anything with effort and passion can be ethical, including fashion. It's not just about clothing and looking great, its about changing lives and leaving behind a positive footprint to guide and inspire others. A LITTLE ABOUT THE FOUNDER AND SYDNEY-DAVIES Euphemia Sydney-Davies is a Sierra Leonean born founder and designer at Sydney-Davies London which is a fairly new independent fashion label specialising in both Womenwear and Menswear characterised by statement and fashion forward pieces, bold un-afraid colour and beautifully crafted and alternative fabrics. The label was born in 2013 shortly after completing a fashion degree course in Scotland, internship and training at Alexander McQueen and further fashion business studies at Central Saint Martins. Growing up in the East Side of Freetown, Sierra Leone until the age of 13 when she and her mother fled Sierra Leone as refugees soon after the end of the rebel invasion during the brutal civil war, she has held a great zeal for life, and an eternal optimist.Her experiences in Sierra Leone had a phenomenal impact on her personal and professional life. Since leaving Sierra Leone as a young child she was overcome with the need to somehow give something back to a land she feels as proud to be a citizen of as frustrated by the neglect and regular and systematic demoralisation of the image and capabilities of Africa and Africans in main stream media. "I have lived with the deepest urge to go and give back to Sierra Leone and find a way to inspire and develop my country."  HOW THE PROJECT WAS BORN.As a small start-up fashion business with limited finance, she faced and still does the struggle most other similar businesses do with regards to the small scale production of her clothing. A lot of businesses in the fashion and clothing industry need production and due to cost, availability and quantities, seek production abroad in places like India and China. This led her to a eureka moment as she thought, why not Sierra Leone? Why not Africa, where there is an abundance of skill and will.This led Euphemia to the decision to seek manufacture of her labels clothing in Sierra Leone. Taking the leap of faith, she purchased a handful of sewing machines and studio equipment to be shipped to Freetown. Everything had been packed and on its way on a shipping boat when the Ebola disaster broke out, something that affected her family on a personal level as she lost her Aunt Dr Olivet Buck named the 4th doctor to die from the epidemic. After waiting nearly 2 years to get the go ahead and for Sierra Leone to be declared Ebola free, Euphemia travelled back to Freetown earlier this year for 5 weeks where she worked with 7 local men and women (from some to no experience in garment making) in studios in Regent and Waterloo. They were well paid above the national living wage yet was also very affordable for a small business like hers. This trip was initially limited to Euphemia and her clothing line.With recent disastrous events in 3rd world factories and the rife of despicable, abusive and inhumane working conditions, I am somewhat discouraged in seeking production of my products in places where I am unable to really monitor activities or gain accurate and truthful feedback on how my clothing is produced. I refuse to enlist the services of factories unless I have personally visited them and it is this very reason I only produce my own pieces, and source production here in the UK where possible, and the main factor in the birth of my sewing school project and factory in Sierra Leone. Instead of spending time and money travelling miles away I had a eureka moment and thought why not set something up myself. Something in a land that's dear to me, a place largely avoided by the fashion industry although the skill, need and most of all Will are plenty, and something that would help change not only my life but the lives of many and a place I can monitor and ensure quality and. I understand the culture, traditions, language and the people and I would be a secure source of garment manufacture for other small business as the project grows providing them with confidence and security in knowing not only are they gaining affordable production but ethically too. However upon her return to London she felt there was potential for a lot more to be done. Following a proposal to the Canterbury of West Africa, she has been granted permission and land space to build her dreams, gaining the approval and support of the largest church in West Africa and will be working in conjunction with them. This would be the first international sewing school and production studio of its scale in Sierra Leone and will not only provide jobs for local people, but take in young people, teaching and educating them in garment construction, giving them a lifelong skill they can use to support themselves when they move on from the school.‘I am well trained and confident I bear the skills and discipline to impart lifelong skills, inspire and motivate young and old, supporting them where possible with their own sewing machines and setting them on a path to work and income security.’ SHORT TERM DEVELOPMENTThe money we are hoping to raise will go towards building the school from ground up and equipping it with, chairs, tables, fashion studio schooling equipment, sewing machines, computers, educational material, maintenance and the general running of the academy for the first 3 years. During their time, they will learn and develop key skills in tailoring and garment construction. I really hope you'd be able to give as little or as much as you can. You are appreciated! Please do feel free to get in touch with me should you have any questions, suggestions or would just like to know more. Thank you so so so very much for your support. BE PART OF AN ICONIC MOVEMENT TO MAKE THE WORLD A BETTER PLACE.                                                                                                                                        Thank you, Love ESD x

story:
MISSION

60% of the climate changing global emissions are issued while producing consumers goods (source IPCC): this sheds light on how important it is to change the products that will be consumed by the market into sustainable ones so as to reverse the major environmental phenomena. 

But those products really need to make the difference, both by attracting the consumer as being the best one to choose and as really making a difference in term of global environmental and social care.

Our school wishes to provide the right education to wine industry professionals, a rigorous value chain just like many others, in particular granting scholarships to those managers of small firms in this sector who have limited access to qualified information and research.

WHO WE ARE

The Salcheto winery and the Siena University are the first promoters of this project, after having developed, in the last 7 years, a network of over 30 institutions (universities, government bodies, research centers) specialized in sustainable wine development.  

Salcheto is also the winery with many international firsts, such as the “off-grid” cellar, and the most complete certified study on wine carbon footprint (www.salcheto.it).

The Siena University, among the oldest academic institutions in the world (founded 1240), has strongly invested in sustainability and is the headquarters for the Mediterranean region of the United Nations Sustainable Development Solutions Network (www.sdsn-mediterranean.unisi.it) and the head of the PRIMA project (www.unisi.it/programma-prima).

WHAT WILL THE FUNDS BE USED FOR?

The School by itself does not require any headquarters or facilities in general (it would not be sustainable considering how many already exists), but rather is seeking support to cover the on -going start-up costs (administrative and promotion of €.21.500). Most of the funds raised will be used to provide 10 Scholarships, for a total amount of €.72.500, to the first Master in Wine Sustainability – Marketing and Business Management. The funding is also supported through Perks by products and services from Salcheto Winery. When taken by backers instead of other donations, the company will cover the production cost (an average of 40%) and use the remaining funds, net of tax and campaign commissions, for the school start-up and scholarships. Another way to make those proudly sustainable products a good business.

If the funds raised exceed what requested, the School will be able to increase the number of scholarships given and/or start further courses. The first Master in Wine Sustainability will be offered in September 2016. Please have a look to our website for further details on this project (www.thewineschool.it).

A gallery of our perks:

Some views of the Salcheto Winery

The 6 glasses made of spare bottles

The "made of grapes only" Obvius Rosso - Rosato and a 6 pack of Salcheto wines

                            

A room and a view of the Salcheto Winehouse (www.salchetowinehouse.com)

story:
About the Campaign: A Crowd-Sourced Database of Nigerian Scams

Have you ever been scammed? Or know someone who has been scammed? Imagine if you could report these scammers to a database or check if that person you are about to send money to is a scammer... Now stop imagining.

Every scam comes down to a couple things… Communication and transaction. Our platform has been designed in a way to blacklist these common, not easily replaceable media (bank account numbers etc)  to prevent unsuspecting citizens from falling victims. 

According to a report released by Ultrascan AGI on Nigerian 419 Advance Fee Fraud statistics, losses from Nigerian scams totaled $12.7 billion in 2013.

Right now we have an initial beta version at www,scammr.com.ng

How does this work?

Like other crowd-sourcing projects, Scammr is dependent on the public's contribution to its data base. Scammr keeps a record of scam tools such as phone numbers, emails, bank account numbers e.t.c that have been encountered by other people and have been submitted to the Scammr platform. We present an avenue for you to check the details of a transaction you are about to make against already provided data by contributors.

There are two parts to this project:

  • The first part is reporting a scam. Members of the general public can report scams they have either experienced and/or come across on different platforms. A database is maintained with these data.
  • The second part is checking for scams. Before sending airtime to a number for a data bundle or paying to that online store, you can check their details such as phone number or account number to see if it has been blacklisted as a scammer. Hence saving many people from falling victims.

The Impact

This project provides a valuable space for knowledge informing users of the various methods and approaches that scammers are using to get one over their victims. People's experience from scams and the tools reported can go a long way to prevent the next victim from falling for this scammer.

Gradually, we would be building up a database of known methods of defrauding people and also the tools used in the process. Hereby providing a form of immunity to people and of course rendering multiple scam attempts extinct.

We are also looking to make an open API where businesses that transactions between two or more parties are their backbones can also leverage on our platform. Businesses such as Job platforms, classifieds etc.

Challenges

Our biggest challenge is making Scammr accessible to everyone regardless of platform leveraging on technologies such as SMS USSDs, etc.

Other Ways You Can Help

In case you can't contribute financially, please stay in touch. Your knowledge or any other tips you have may be useful in the long run.

Also, please share this campaign and get your loved ones to chip in.

  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it. Follow us on twitter for more.

story:
Fuckbarrel : ( Noun )- a situation in which there is no good, or at least a difficult outcome. Often brought upon one's self by an act of stupidity. A fuck barrel may also simply be a horrible situation.

John Oliver's #Shutdownthefuckbarrel Video



Congress Has Become a Money Funded FuckBarrel And If You Don't Vote That Will NEVER Change.




"Why should I vote? All of the candidates are the same? They are just the lesser of Two Evils!"




This is the single biggest issue facing today's elections. 

Many of our friends and family stay home and opt out of because they believe their vote doesn't count. This coupled with those that show up mindless to vote for party lines, has caused a trickle down effect of corruption in our political system. The combination of these behaviors has guaranteed that America keeps electing people they hate. That's right America, we keep electing a group of welfare queens to run our country's checkbook.




Our Solution?


  1. Make your vote matter again
  2. Revitalize the Progressive Party in Congress
  3. Subsidize your democracy 


  


America needs a third party, maybe even a fifth. The revolution will not be televised however, America's third party will not be formed in the streets. Not to belittle to amazing efforts we have seen from protestors put forth, but if we do not transfer that energy to the ballots it will be all for naught. The only one that can fix this is you. With over 400 seats up for grabs, America has the rare opportunity of turning Congress on its head. Through surgical coordination with the "ONE-TERMERS THINK TANK", this Super PAC will target every Congressional Seat that is running against a Bernie-Crat. With our app, America will have a level of influence in politics never seen before. This Super PAC is powerful because, it is only interested in one result, Berning Down Congress.


To do this we will be creating an app to serve as a tool for this change; the app will be available to anyone for free, bringing greater voter awareness to all Bernie-Crats and One-termers based on location.


TINDER MEETS THE BALLOT BOX


How does it work? Just like Tinder, it uses your location. You will be able to put your street address and zip code into the App. If a Bernie-crat or One-termer is available to win the election, you will receive this push notification to your phone.

"Historic Event Unlocked"

" You have a Third Choice in your area"

 Once you review the candidate, if you like what you see, simply swipe right. That's a pledge to vote.  All users in the area can view the number of dedicated pledges. This will allow you in real time to view the votes in your community. Now you will know not only that your vote counts but that you're a part of a much larger effort. More importantly, you can do all this political badassery from the comfort of your couch, favorite coffee shop, work, or anywhere your phone goes. Congratulations, You have no excuse for missing an election ever again.

"When democrats stay home congress turns red."

-Tof

"One of the penalties for refusing to participate in politics is that you end up being governed by your inferiors"


This isn't the Super PAC Bernie asked for, but its the one he needs


What is a Super PAC?



CONGRESS  IS BROKEN

This congress is the most unproductive body in history. If today's workers are at risk of losing their jobs due to runaway capitalism, and bad trade agreements (TPP)  then so should the American congress. Firing your Congress and placing yourself (Or a One-termer) in office, is  the most democratic thing someone can do in 2016.


America has one of the most powerful tools available to kick out the corrupt, and bring in the new.


 ENTER THE WRITE IN

The write-in allows Americans to choose a candidate that can bypass the traditional mess of primaries, caucuses, and super-delegates which a tend to make mockery of our voting process. Allowing them to challenge the True Welfare Queens incumbents who spend their time campaigning instead of working through the write-in is the first step to getting money out of politics. America should not settle for a BROKEN CONGRESS. We do this because our friends, neighbors teachers or basically anyone, can not afford the time/money needed to get on the ballot, despite being a sobering improvement for our democracy. 

We need working class heroes to run for congress, and we need them to win.


                    The Write in Needs an Upgrade


What does this mean?

It means, currently, the whole state of New York could not get John Oliver elected, even if they wrote his name in. Unless he files the necessary paperwork and makes the whole State aware simultaneously, he will never  win. Even after that, John Oliver's name is not publicly displayed at the ballot office. Unless someone can use massive amounts of money or celebrity, America will never get the THIRD choice it so badly craves.


HOW MUCH DOES IT COST TO GET ON THE BALLET

Depending on the State it can cost thousands of signatures, dollars, or both.


The 2016 presidential race will be the most expensive election in U.S. history — projected to cost more than $10 billion!




There is too much money in politics- Our democracy is experiencing historic levels of corruption and incompetence in the United States Congress.


Enter Shutdown The Fuck Barrel Super PAC


A Renegade Millennial Super PAC on a mission to start Americas Progressive Party by systemically firing our Congress with the surgical precision of Tinder and the wit of Mark Twain. The Third Party starts the moment we truly diversify Congress with Comedians, Anthropologists, Scientists, Bernie-Crats and YOU.


Shut Down The Fuck Barrel PAC is the Super PAC by and for the people. We are the response to a congress owned by billionaires, corporations, and lobbyist who treats congress like their personal strip club. Shut Down The Fuck Barrel PAC was inspired via satirical news…or actual journalism. Shows like the Daily Show, The Nightly Show, and Last Week Tonight, have been effective in using satire as a tool for activism, speaking out against all forms of discrimination, corruption, and anything else Fox News would include on its Tinder profile. 

Political satire, rooted in truth, allows the comedian to illustrate the absurdity of politics. Following the same model, Shut Down The Fuck Barrel PAC is a satirical approach to a very real problem, elections purchased by Super PACs. Citizens United v. FEC deemed that money equals free speech, removing restrictions on “independent” political spending. Well America, if money equals free speech, then let them hear you fucking roar. Instead of attempting to reverse Citizens United, we see this ruling as an opportunity to benefit the underrepresented while also re-establishing a lost generation’s voice in politics. 

Our plan includes activating voters, as well as encouraging more Americans to run for office at the Federal and State levels. By spending effectively and strategically, the PAC serves as a financial megaphone for the politically and economically oppressed, and a means of generating awareness without collaborating with candidates published at Theonetermers.com. and Onetermers App.

We will generate awareness through Philanthropic Acts of Community Investment (P.A.C.)

This isn’t the SUPER PAC Bernie asked for, but it is the one he needs. In the words of Henry Ford. “If I had asked people what they wanted, they would have said faster horses”.

The main purpose is to help get people with the same values as Bernie elected to Congress. For less than a Netflix subscription ($6 per month /72 per year) you can subsidize actual democracy, give a voice to the voiceless and Shut Down The Fuck Barrel and make congress #FeelTheFuckingBern


BERN CONGRESS DOWN



We need everyday people with the same values as Bernie Sanders to run for Congress. Bernie Sanders has already fundamentally changed America's political landscape. Electing people with the same values as Bernie, will allow Bernie as a President, to actually implement the agenda he has proposed, with none of the purposeful obstruction seen in Obama presidency.

Why Comedians, Scientist, Anthropologist?

Comedians are the kryptonite to the Bullshit Congress feeds the American public. The reality is, that there is no better person Anthropologically to call out Congress publicly on their corruption.

Do you hate Science? Congress does! This needs to change, and it happens when you elect Scientist and Anthropologist. Anthropologist see through the Bullshit rituals and fallacies Congress participates in. You don't believe us? Please read the book Tribes On The Hill


Imagine a world where Neil deGrasse Tyson is Speaker Of The House


Congress is broken because of its lack of diversity, and it seems to be allergic to Science. With an approval rating of 10% not only is this America's Most Hated Congress, it is the least effective. The reality is if anything in your life had a 10% approval rating, you would actively seek a way to get it out of your life. We believe this Congress deserves no exception.



America’s corruption crisis is the #1 issue for the entire 2016 race. With your help, Shutdown The Fuck Barrel Super PAC will not only get the country talking about money in politics, but offer a cheap solution to diversifying congress, while blanketing America with hilarious acts of Philanthropy as a form of modern day political marketing.

If billions are going to be spent on this election, we believe the money should be used to creatively spread awareness and simultaneously help the under-represented.

This Video by Represent.us perfectly illustrates why this Congress MUST GO


What We Need


If you cannot afford to donate financially don't feel bad, instead donate as much social media currency as you can. We need this to be shared, with anyone who wants the next Congress to work with Bernie NOT against. John Oliver? 

With an approval rating of 10% the reality is there are HUNDREDS OF MILLIONS of people who are tired of this congress. To work at full capacity, we need less than 10% of these people to get engaged. This number is realistic but only if you share.

 We need thousands of people to be aware that a third choice is finally


  •  $1,000,000 will allow us to Kick Start "The One Termers Think Tank", begin work to rebuild congress, execute P.A.C.s and to develop the app.
  • From there we ask that you donate 6 dollars a month, and tell your friends and families about it. We chose 6$ a month because we wanted to encourage as many people as possible to participate in the political process. When thousands of people get behind an idea and give a little, revolutions can happen. We want this to work, but not a steep cost to anyone. The overarching goal is to raise a billion dollars, so that we can not only help millions of people with our unique philanthropy Super PAC model so that we can accomplish what we set out to do.....Refresh Congress and FIX DEMOCRACY.


If funded the think tank will start hiring immediately, to help run the most intelligent funniest think tank in America. It's gonna be Yuge.


  •  The think tank will generate content, media, academic research on the issues that matter. Start a Comedic political Radio Show. Create hilarious Ads to be shared via the world wide web.

  •  We will also use the money to impact upcoming Georgia and Florida Elections. Specifically, we will target the potential Super Majority in Georgia's State legislature so that bills like the Anti- religious freedom bill never see the floor of the assembly. We will also start a new trend in political marketing, philanthropy in action. Why? Because we are a SUPER PAC and we may spend however we please, as long as we do not coordinate with Federal Candidates. We don't plan to speak to any. We are a renegade Super PAC

Philanthropic Acts of Community(P.A.C.)
  • Solar Paneling in low-income neighborhoods
  • Sponsor Habitat for Humanity community events
  • Subsidize Food Truck Festivals in cities with High Homeless populations
  • Restore abandoned neighborhoods and community programs
  • Anything else we or you can come up with, anything is fair game when you're a Super PAC gone rogue.

If we don't reach our Goal we will try again because creating a Congress that will work for Bernie is not something the American people can afford to pass up. With 400+ seats Up for Election in 2016, we can't afford to quit...and neither can you!


The reality is, the only way we can create a Congress that will work with Bernie is to actively flip congressional districts and Bern Congress Down. 


What is a One-termer?




A One-termer is any American citizen that is willing to uphold the following criteria:


  • A One-termer does not discriminate against any groups, based on religion, gender, party, race, and/or sexuality.

  • A One-termer willingly agrees, to run for one term at a time, and does not campaign for reelection during their term. They simple Clock in and work for the people

  • A One-termer truly represents their constituents

  • A One-termer is a proponent of transparent politics

  • A One-termer is the opposite of today’s bullshit politicians, a decent fucking human being.

A One-termer can be anyone.They are your waiters, professors, scientists, stand-up comedians, small business owners, poets, artists, satirical news show hosts, or celebrities. A One-termer is YOU.

What issues do One-termers focus on?


We believe if a candidate can uphold the previously mentioned core values, then they immediately have a more transparent and honest approach to politics than our current representatives; At the very least, they won't be as useless as our current congress (Approval rating of 10%)


  • Supports a modern and streamlined voting process with fair access

  • Protecting voting rights

  • Criminal Justice Reform

  • Standardized Write-In laws

  • A Living Wage/Basic Income

  • Student Loan Reform

  • Legalization of Marijuana

  • Strengthening of Civil Liberties

  • Union Reestablishment

  • Support for Sustainable and Renewable Energy

  • Education Reform

  • Technological and Scientific advancement

  • Net Neutrality

  • Adding 30 minutes to Last Week Tonight



Your Impact


If You want different results, you have to do things differently

If giving to this cause is not an option, the most important thing you can do is share. This is a blatant attempt for a political revolution. Political revolutions happen when people decide to break the current paradigm. Please share this with 10 people who resonate with this message. Ask them to do the same. Doing this is the fastest way to accumulate the people power required take on a political entity that goes largely unnoticed by most Americans, Congress.
story_txt:
Fuckbarrel : ( Noun )- a situation in which there is no good, or at least a difficult outcome. Often brought upon one's self by an act of stupidity. A fuck barrel may also simply be a horrible situation. 


John Oliver's #Shutdownthefuckbarrel Video





Congress Has Become a Money Funded FuckBarrel And If You Don't Vote That Will NEVER Change.
 
"Why should I vote? All of the candidates are the same? They are just the lesser of Two Evils!"




This is the single biggest issue facing today's elections. 
Many of our friends and family stay home and opt out of because they believe their vote doesn't count. This coupled with those that show up mindless to vote for party lines, has caused a trickle down effect of corruption in our political system. The combination of these behaviors has guaranteed that America keeps electing people they hate. That's right America, we keep electing a group of welfare queens to run our country's checkbook. 





Our Solution?







Make your vote matter again
Revitalize the Progressive Party in Congress
Subsidize your democracy 








  


America needs a third party, maybe even a fifth. The revolution will not be televised however, America's third party will not be formed in the streets. Not to belittle to amazing efforts we have seen from protestors put forth, but if we do not transfer that energy to the ballots it will be all for naught. The only one that can fix this is you. With over 400 seats up for grabs, America has the rare opportunity of turning Congress on its head. Through surgical coordination with the "ONE-TERMERS THINK TANK", this Super PAC will target every Congressional Seat that is running against a Bernie-Crat. With our app, America will have a level of influence in politics never seen before. This Super PAC is powerful because, it is only interested in one result, Berning Down Congress.

To do this we will be creating an app to serve as a tool for this change; the app will be available to anyone for free, bringing greater voter awareness to all Bernie-Crats and One-termers based on location.

TINDER MEETS THE BALLOT BOX



How does it work? Just like Tinder, it uses your location. You will be able to put your street address and zip code into the App. If a Bernie-crat or One-termer is available to win the election, you will receive this push notification to your phone. 

"Historic Event Unlocked"
" You have a Third Choice in your area"

 Once you review the candidate, if you like what you see, simply swipe right. That's a pledge to vote.  All users in the area can view the number of dedicated pledges. This will allow you in real time to view the votes in your community. Now you will know not only that your vote counts but that you're a part of a much larger effort. More importantly, you can do all this political badassery from the comfort of your couch, favorite coffee shop, work, or anywhere your phone goes. Congratulations, You have no excuse for missing an election ever again.

"When democrats stay home congress turns red."
-Tof
 "One of the penalties for refusing to participate in politics is that you end up being governed by your inferiors"



This isn't the Super PAC Bernie asked for, but its the one he needs

What is a Super PAC?

CONGRESS  IS BROKEN


This congress is the most unproductive body in history. If today's workers are at risk of losing their jobs due to runaway capitalism, and bad trade agreements (TPP)  then so should the American congress. Firing your Congress and placing yourself (Or a One-termer) in office, is  the most democratic thing someone can do in 2016.
America has one of the most powerful tools available to kick out the corrupt, and bring in the new.

 ENTER THE WRITE IN
The write-in allows Americans to choose a candidate that can bypass the traditional mess of primaries, caucuses, and super-delegates which a tend to make mockery of our voting process. Allowing them to challenge the True Welfare Queens incumbents who spend their time campaigning instead of working through the write-in is the first step to getting money out of politics. America should not settle for a BROKEN CONGRESS. We do this because our friends, neighbors teachers or basically anyone, can not afford the time/money needed to get on the ballot, despite being a sobering improvement for our democracy. 
We need working class heroes to run for congress, and we need them to win.


                    The Write in Needs an Upgrade

What does this mean? 
It means, currently, the whole state of New York could not get John Oliver elected, even if they wrote his name in. Unless he files the necessary paperwork and makes the whole State aware simultaneously, he will never  win. Even after that, John Oliver's name is not publicly displayed at the ballot office. Unless someone can use massive amounts of money or celebrity, America will never get the THIRD choice it so badly craves.
 
HOW MUCH DOES IT COST TO GET ON THE BALLET
Depending on the State it can cost thousands of signatures, dollars, or both.

The 2016 presidential race will be the most expensive election in U.S. history — projected to cost more than $10 billion!





There is too much money in politics- Our democracy is experiencing historic levels of corruption and incompetence in the United States Congress. 

Enter Shutdown The Fuck Barrel Super PAC 

A Renegade Millennial Super PAC on a mission to start Americas Progressive Party by systemically firing our Congress with the surgical precision of Tinder and the wit of Mark Twain. The Third Party starts the moment we truly diversify Congress with Comedians, Anthropologists, Scientists, Bernie-Crats and YOU. 


Shut Down The Fuck Barrel PAC is the Super PAC by and for the people. We are the response to a congress owned by billionaires, corporations, and lobbyist who treats congress like their personal strip club. Shut Down The Fuck Barrel PAC was inspired via satirical news…or actual journalism. Shows like the Daily Show, The Nightly Show, and Last Week Tonight, have been effective in using satire as a tool for activism, speaking out against all forms of discrimination, corruption, and anything else Fox News would include on its Tinder profile. 
Political satire, rooted in truth, allows the comedian to illustrate the absurdity of politics. Following the same model, Shut Down The Fuck Barrel PAC is a satirical approach to a very real problem, elections purchased by Super PACs. Citizens United v. FEC deemed that money equals free speech, removing restrictions on “independent” political spending. Well America, if money equals free speech, then let them hear you fucking roar. Instead of attempting to reverse Citizens United, we see this ruling as an opportunity to benefit the underrepresented while also re-establishing a lost generation’s voice in politics. Our plan includes activating voters, as well as encouraging more Americans to run for office at the Federal and State levels. By spending effectively and strategically, the PAC serves as a financial megaphone for the politically and economically oppressed, and a means of generating awareness without collaborating with candidates published at Theonetermers.com. and Onetermers App.
We will generate awareness through Philanthropic Acts of Community Investment (P.A.C.)This isn’t the SUPER PAC Bernie asked for, but it is the one he needs. In the words of Henry Ford. “If I had asked people what they wanted, they would have said faster horses”. 
The main purpose is to help get people with the same values as Bernie elected to Congress. For less than a Netflix subscription ($6 per month /72 per year) you can subsidize actual democracy, give a voice to the voiceless and Shut Down The Fuck Barrel and make congress #FeelTheFuckingBern

BERN CONGRESS DOWN




We need everyday people with the same values as Bernie Sanders to run for Congress. Bernie Sanders has already fundamentally changed America's political landscape. Electing people with the same values as Bernie, will allow Bernie as a President, to actually implement the agenda he has proposed, with none of the purposeful obstruction seen in Obama presidency.

Why Comedians, Scientist, Anthropologist?
Comedians are the kryptonite to the Bullshit Congress feeds the American public. The reality is, that there is no better person Anthropologically to call out Congress publicly on their corruption.
Do you hate Science? Congress does! This needs to change, and it happens when you elect Scientist and Anthropologist. Anthropologist see through the Bullshit rituals and fallacies Congress participates in. You don't believe us? Please read the book Tribes On The Hill


Imagine a world where Neil deGrasse Tyson is Speaker Of The House



Congress is broken because of its lack of diversity, and it seems to be allergic to Science. With an approval rating of 10% not only is this America's Most Hated Congress, it is the least effective. The reality is if anything in your life had a 10% approval rating, you would actively seek a way to get it out of your life. We believe this Congress deserves no exception.



America’s corruption crisis is the #1 issue for the entire 2016 race. With your help, Shutdown The Fuck Barrel Super PAC will not only get the country talking about money in politics, but offer a cheap solution to diversifying congress, while blanketing America with hilarious acts of Philanthropy as a form of modern day political marketing.
If billions are going to be spent on this election, we believe the money should be used to creatively spread awareness and simultaneously help the under-represented.
This Video by Represent.us perfectly illustrates why this Congress MUST GO

  What We Need 


If you cannot afford to donate financially don't feel bad, instead donate as much social media currency as you can. We need this to be shared, with anyone who wants the next Congress to work with Bernie NOT against. John Oliver? 
With an approval rating of 10% the reality is there are HUNDREDS OF MILLIONS of people who are tired of this congress. To work at full capacity, we need less than 10% of these people to get engaged. This number is realistic but only if you share.
 We need thousands of people to be aware that a third choice is finally   
 $1,000,000 will allow us to Kick Start "The One Termers Think Tank", begin work to rebuild congress, execute P.A.C.s and to develop the app.

From there we ask that you donate 6 dollars a month, and tell your friends and families about it. We chose 6$ a month because we wanted to encourage as many people as possible to participate in the political process. When thousands of people get behind an idea and give a little, revolutions can happen. We want this to work, but not a steep cost to anyone. The overarching goal is to raise a billion dollars, so that we can not only help millions of people with our unique philanthropy Super PAC model so that we can accomplish what we set out to do.....Refresh Congress and FIX DEMOCRACY.

Specifically, we will target the potential Super Majority in Georgia's State legislature so that bills like the Anti- religious freedom bill never see the floor of the assembly. Sponsor Habitat for Humanity community events


Subsidize Food Truck Festivals in cities with High Homeless populations

story:
www.cambonu.com is a new Social Network launching in Africa.

This social network aim to highlight some or if possible most of the problems Africa is facing. We are coming with a new approach to help Africa: Introspection.

We believe most of the problems Africa is facing right now has its root in our African brothers behavior. Wars, diseases, starvation ... can be avoided if we start thinking differently. 

But we keep blaming whole the world for our misfortune.

We want to change that. We want Africans to start asking themselves what they are doing wrong. We think a social network is a good place for that since it is a good place to share information and it can be used for education.


In this Social Network, we will fight Stereotypes and Prejudices in Africa. We want Africans to share information about corruption and any other bad behavior they face. We will make videos, photos and will start investigations and share the information we will get. We plan to study every aspect of African life and educate people about the short and also the long term consequences of theirs actions.

The money we get will not be used to feed people but instead we plan to launch campaigns and raise awareness of Africans about what they can do to live a better life.

We are Africans and we believe Africa can change but the first step is to let Africans know they have a problem and then work hard to solve it. With a change in African mentality we will not fear wars or others calamities Africa is facing in the future.

If you happen to have videos, photos or information you can share with the world and that information can help change people mentality, please share it on www.cambonu.com or tell your friends about this social network.
