story:
All or nothing! (Tutto o niente!)

If we won't raise the all target, you will have all your contribution back!
(Se non raggiungiamo la cifra obiettivo, avrai indietro tutto il tuo contributo!)

What our territory is! (Cos'è il nostro territorio!)

Watch the picture and you will understand. This is only a part (the Misurina lake) of a  UNESCO world heritage called Dolomiti!
But... here we've got a very big problem from the hardness of the life in the highlands: nothing helps us from the rest of the country. No specific laws, no moneyfavors, no helpfull conditions, no roads develop, no railways, no broadband web... nothing from Italy!
We live in a nature paradise, that's becoming a hell for a modern life-style! 

(Guardate la foto e capirete. Questa è solo una parte (il lago di Misurina) di un patrimonio mondiale dell'UNESCO denominato Dolomiti!

Ma ... qui abbiamo un problema molto grande dovuto dalla durezza della vita nelle Highlands: nessuno aiuto dal resto del paese. Senza leggi specifiche, senza vantaggi economici, senza condizioni di favore, senza sviluppo stradale, senza ferrovie, senza banda larga web ... niente dall'Italia!

Viviamo in un paradiso naturale, che sta diventando un inferno per un moderno stile di vita!)


What We Need & What You Get (Cosa ci serve e cosa tu puoi dare)

We tried so much with traditional politic untill we lost hopes.

With the traditional politics! 

Politics is for society and I will fight untill a kind of society will be up this mountains trying to find a way to survive. 

I want to reverse the usual politic perspective: I want to start from the territory with revolutionary politic. Not a philosophy (tory or labour, left or right, black or red) but an enviroment will be in the center. In my place the nature is so strong that we must consider it to guide our political decision.

  • I want to create a web-site working like a virtual square to let the associations, the farms, the factories, the companies, the mayors and all the stake-holders could find each-others. They will find other mountaniers and they'll tell them what they do and what they need: because unity is strenght! 
  • I also want to promote it seriously on local media. 
  • I think this project is strong because wants to create a lobby from a whole small fragile territory for the territory.
  • The steps are: 4000eur to create a good web platform, 10000eur of advertisment and promotion, 1000eur in a possible prize for you.
(Abbiamo provato tanto con politica tradizionale fino a che abbiamo perso le speranze.


Con la politica tradizionale!

Ma la politica è per la società e mi batterò finche un qualche tipo di società resisterà su queste montagne, cercando di trovare un modo per sopravvivere quassù.

Voglio invertire la solita prospettiva politica: voglio iniziare dal territorio con una politica rivoluzionaria. Non una filosofia (conservatori o laburisti, sinistra o destra, nero o rosso), ma un ambiente saranno al centro. Dove vivo io la natura è così forte che dobbiamo considerare che sia ella a guidare la nostra decisione politica.

Voglio creare un sito web che lavora come una piazza virtuale per consentire che le associazioni, le aziende agricole, le fabbriche, le aziende, i sindaci e tutti i portatori di interesse possono trovare ogni-altro. Troveranno altri montanari e faranno dire loro quello che fanno e di cui hanno bisogno: perché l'unità fa la forza!

Voglio anche promuovere seriamente sui media locali questo progetto.

Penso che sia un'idea vincente perché vuole creare una lobby da un piccolo territorio fragile per il territorio stesso.

I passi sono: 4000eur per creare una buona piattaforma web, 10000eur di pubblicità e promozione, 1000euro in premio possibile per te).

The Impact (Gli effetti)

Your contribution will help to give to our territory one more chance to live. 

  • It will let the people from this wonderful mountains  to stay here...

  • ...because a place with no people living there is just for some explorers!
  • And there is a particolar prize for the biggest contributor: 3 days in the hotel from where we take the image (Locanda Quinz lago di Misurina) and 1 day trekking the mountain around (3 Cime di Lavaredo) with a professional guide just to touch the paradise 120km north than Venice! 
  • For all the other contributors, there will be the opportunity to come in a still living highland for the next long years.
(Il tuo contributo aiuterà a dare al nostro territorio una possibilità in più di vivere.

Consentirà alla gente di questa splendida montagna di stare qui ...

... perché un luogo senza le persone che lo vivono è solo per pochi esploratori!

E c'è un premio particolar per il più grande contributore: 3 giorni in albergo, da dove prendiamo l'immagine (Locanda Quinz lago di Misurina) e 1 giorno di trekking della montagna intorno (3 Cime di Lavaredo), con una guida professionale. Toccare il  di paradiso 120 km a nord di Venezia!

Per tutti gli altri contribuenti, resterà l'opportunità di visitare ancora per lunghi anni questa meraviglia vivente).

Risks & Challenges (Rischi e sfide)

This web-site needs to be well knowed on the territory. 

After that it needs to be build with a solid structure because could be hackered. 

It will also need a good potential of developing because it could need a blog, a news line, a events calendar, a news-letter, a forum in the very next future.

It will need a solid program of media-advertisment and interaction with territory, like meetings, conventions and reunions with local administrators.

(Questo sito web deve essere ben conosciuto sul territorio.

Dopo di che ha bisogno di essere costruito con una struttura solida, perché potrebbe subire attacchi di hacker.

Dovrà avere un buon potenziale di sviluppo perché potrebbe avere bisogno di un blog, una linea di notizie, un calendario di eventi, una news-letter, un forum in un futuromolto prossimo .

Avrà bisogno di un solido programma di media-pubblicità e l'interazione con il territorio, come incontri, convegni e riunioni con gli amministratori locali.)


Other Ways You Can Help (Altri modi per aiutarci)

Sharing our difficoult or video on your social accounts or just coming here to visit us you will help our cause!

(Condividi questa pagina sul tuo account di social o semplicemente vieni qui a trovarci: aiuterai la nostra causa!)
story_txt:
All or nothing! (Tutto o niente!)
If we won't raise the all target, you will have all your contribution back!
(Se non raggiungiamo la cifra obiettivo, avrai indietro tutto il tuo contributo!)
What our territory is! (Cos'è il nostro territorio!)
Watch the picture and you will understand. This is only a part (the Misurina lake) of a  UNESCO world heritage called Dolomiti!
But... here we've got a very big problem from the hardness of the life in the highlands: nothing helps us from the rest of the country. No specific laws, no moneyfavors, no helpfull conditions, no roads develop, no railways, no broadband web... nothing from Italy!

We live in a nature paradise, that's becoming a hell for a modern life-style! 
(Guardate la foto e capirete. Questa è solo una parte (il lago di Misurina) di un patrimonio mondiale dell'UNESCO denominato Dolomiti!
Ma ... qui abbiamo un problema molto grande dovuto dalla durezza della vita nelle Highlands: nessuno aiuto dal resto del paese. Senza leggi specifiche, senza vantaggi economici, senza condizioni di favore, senza sviluppo stradale, senza ferrovie, senza banda larga web ... niente dall'Italia!
Viviamo in un paradiso naturale, che sta diventando un inferno per un moderno stile di vita!)
   What We Need & What You Get (Cosa ci serve e cosa tu puoi dare) We tried so much with traditional politic untill we lost hopes.
With the traditional politics! 
Politics is for society and I will fight untill a kind of society will be up this mountains trying to find a way to survive. 
I want to reverse the usual politic perspective: I want to start from the territory with revolutionary politic. Not a philosophy (tory or labour, left or right, black or red) but an enviroment will be in the center. In my place the nature is so strong that we must consider it to guide our political decision.  I want to create a web-site working like a virtual square to let the associations, the farms, the factories, the companies, the mayors and all the stake-holders could find each-others. They will find other mountaniers and they'll tell them what they do and what they need: because unity is strenght! 
I also want to promote it seriously on local media.  I think this project is strong because wants to create a lobby from a whole small fragile territory for the territory. The steps are: 4000eur to create a good web platform, 10000eur of advertisment and promotion, 1000eur in a possible prize for you. 
(Abbiamo provato tanto con politica tradizionale fino a che abbiamo perso le speranze.
Con la politica tradizionale!
Ma la politica è per la società e mi batterò finche un qualche tipo di società resisterà su queste montagne, cercando di trovare un modo per sopravvivere quassù.
Voglio invertire la solita prospettiva politica: voglio iniziare dal territorio con una politica rivoluzionaria. Non una filosofia (conservatori o laburisti, sinistra o destra, nero o rosso), ma un ambiente saranno al centro. Dove vivo io la natura è così forte che dobbiamo considerare che sia ella a guidare la nostra decisione politica.
Voglio creare un sito web che lavora come una piazza virtuale per consentire che le associazioni, le aziende agricole, le fabbriche, le aziende, i sindaci e tutti i portatori di interesse possono trovare ogni-altro. Troveranno altri montanari e faranno dire loro quello che fanno e di cui hanno bisogno: perché l'unità fa la forza!
Voglio anche promuovere seriamente sui media locali questo progetto.
Penso che sia un'idea vincente perché vuole creare una lobby da un piccolo territorio fragile per il territorio stesso.
I passi sono: 4000eur per creare una buona piattaforma web, 10000eur di pubblicità e promozione, 1000euro in premio possibile per te).
   The Impact (Gli effetti) Your contribution will help to give to our territory one more chance to live.   It will let the people from this wonderful mountains  to stay here... ...because a place with no people living there is just for some explorers! And there is a particolar prize for the biggest contributor: 3 days in the hotel from where we take the image (Locanda Quinz lago di Misurina) and 1 day trekking the mountain around (3 Cime di Lavaredo) with a professional guide just to touch the paradise 120km north than Venice! 
For all the other contributors, there will be the opportunity to come in a still living highland for the next long years. 
(Il tuo contributo aiuterà a dare al nostro territorio una possibilità in più di vivere.Consentirà alla gente di questa splendida montagna di stare qui ...
... perché un luogo senza le persone che lo vivono è solo per pochi esploratori!
E c'è un premio particolar per il più grande contributore: 3 giorni in albergo, da dove prendiamo l'immagine (Locanda Quinz lago di Misurina) e 1 giorno di trekking della montagna intorno (3 Cime di Lavaredo), con una guida professionale. Toccare il  di paradiso 120 km a nord di Venezia!
Per tutti gli altri contribuenti, resterà l'opportunità di visitare ancora per lunghi anni questa meraviglia vivente).
   Risks & Challenges (Rischi e sfide)  This web-site needs to be well knowed on the territory. 
After that it needs to be build with a solid structure because could be hackered. 
It will also need a good potential of developing because it could need a blog, a news line, a events calendar, a news-letter, a forum in the very next future.
It will need a solid program of media-advertisment and interaction with territory, like meetings, conventions and reunions with local administrators.

(Questo sito web deve essere ben conosciuto sul territorio.
Dopo di che ha bisogno di essere costruito con una struttura solida, perché potrebbe subire attacchi di hacker.
Dovrà avere un buon potenziale di sviluppo perché potrebbe avere bisogno di un blog, una linea di notizie, un calendario di eventi, una news-letter, un forum in un futuromolto prossimo .
Avrà bisogno di un solido programma di media-pubblicità e l'interazione con il territorio, come incontri, convegni e riunioni con gli amministratori locali.)
   Other Ways You Can Help (Altri modi per aiutarci) Sharing our difficoult or video on your social accounts or just coming here to visit us you will help our cause!
   (Condividi questa pagina sul tuo account di social o semplicemente vieni qui a trovarci: aiuterai la nostra causa!)

story:
The Portal is made with the idea to help smart people around the world to get a full scholarship/tuition paid by the Portal. All they'll have to do is to get assessed and with the assessments result they will be participating in the competition for the full paid tuition.

For making sure that the competition is fair, there will be a commission created from selected teachers who will determine if the Winner has the knowledge demonstrated while passing the tests.

The Portal most important Task is to connect everyone who is involved into Learning process or wants to get a better knowledge.

The Portal is FIRST SOCIAL LEARNING NETWORK in the world and with your help it will become a Reality.

Make your Brain a Winning Educational Lottery ticket

story:
Hi! My name is Leasia McKnight and I'm currently a junior at an Arts High School. Ever since I was 3 I had a passion for singing, and by the time I was 5, I was set on becoming a pop star. However, I always felt conflicted due to my underlying love of helping people. I began to question whether I really wanted to become a singer, if all that meant were entertaining people, and being a celebrity. My dream careers flip-flopped around from veterinarian, to music teacher, to some sort of singing/vet hybrid thingy. Once I figured out that I was allergic to cats and dogs, I realized that just wasn't going to work out.

It wasn't until my freshman year that I was introduced to music therapy. I was thrilled to learn that such a thing exists. I would be able to pursue both helping people and music at the same time. I began to search for colleges that hosted programs in music therapy and was disappointed in the low amount of providers.That's when I discovered Berklee College of Music.

I immediately fell in love with the thought of continuing education at an art school. I had the honor of visiting their campus this Spring and was in complete awe with their state of the art equipment, and their creative, inviting atmosphere. That's why I would love to attend their 5 Week Summer Performance Program. I'll be getting a head start on taking some of their entry level courses as well as being able to find if Berklee is a good fit for me.

I've already received money for registration and the tuition, but I still need to come up with $3,485 for housing. That's why I'm acting for your help to allow me to advance in my future of becoming a music therapist. Even if you can't donate, spreading the word and passing this on to others is greatly appreciated!

story:
Our Vision: Wealth Creation for the African and infrastructural development for Africa through collaborative value creation amongst africans themselves with the support of the global community.


Please watch this 3 minutes explainer video for better understanding of our processes. https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=864...


Our Goals & Objectives

Please download a copy of our 2015 info guide to have a good understanding of the Global Wealth Project and our aspirations, using the following link : https://t.co/U1WhurvrQl

It also gives a background and history of the project.


What is the GWProject ?
The GWProject is a vehicle through which many independent business owners (entrepreneurs, intrapreneurs & professionals) with varied competencies, will find relevance, fulfillment and wealth, as they find greater opportunities to use their skills in collaboration with others, to the benefit of society at better profits.


How does it work ?
First comes the registration of as many individuals as possible, then we givie them re-orientation & conditioning through our city/community specific Wealth Clinics,(i.e. specialized seminars that entails Values coaching, skillset optimization etc). 

Through post wealth clinic testing, we harvest a pool of diverse talents into our CHADAR platform (chamber of wealth consolidators), which serves to structure them into loose corporations & support their transformation into profit making and sharing entities.


Our target demography.
Africans of either gender between the ages of 18 and 65  anywhere in the world. We have started from my home city of Lagos, Nigeria and from here we hope to reach as many cities and countries as resources will enable us reach over the next several years.


Take action NOW to help us change our world.
We implore you to do whatever you can right now, so you can share in the credit of the anticipated success that will be achieved through compounded efforts of many.


The GWProject is a vehicle designed to allow us all contribute our widows mite; whether it be cash or kind to help create a fairer and more equal world. While some as volunteers are physically available to do the work, some are contributing materials/logistical support of different kinds, you can help now by giving any amount from the comfort of your home or workplace.


No amount is too small.


GWProject projections for 2016/2017

Our actual budgetfor this campaign is $250,000 but our target is to raise 30% of that amount through this fundraiser. Hence our $73,000 goal. The remainder is expected to be raised through corporate donors and partners


How the $250,000 would be spent

40 community events are planned for 20 cities in Nigeria while 6 Country launch missions are planned for Benin Republic, Rwanda, South Africa, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom and the United states, all on the cards during the 2016/2017 campaign which is now expected to kick off fully by October 2016 after several postponements & unavoidable delays.


(N.B: A test wealth Clinic for the 2016/2017 campaign was held in Lagos on July 9th, 2016. Images and video available at www.globalwealthproject.com)


Each of the 40 Wealth Clinic events will cost $1,500 each while the country launch missions have budgets varying from $4,500 for Benin Republic to $15,000 for the US, totalling $49,500. 


The balance of the budgeted $250,000 will help us open administrative offices/CHADAR centres in all the initial 40 communities in Nigeria and regional offices in all the countries earmarked for the launch missions, with the necessary staffing put in place, in preparation for the full roll out of the project in those regions, planned for 2017/2018. Production costs for the Wealth foundations educational materials including online learning resources, hard-copy books, DVDs, etc.would also be provided for.

Your support won't go unrewarded immediately.
Once you donate, you are assured of great perks, like free branded/limited edition/hand-made GWProject t-shirts, golf tops, jerseys, key rings, mugs etc. as well as Free audio/video downloads of all 3 presentations from the innaugural Wealth Clinic for the 2016/2017 campaign held in Lagos, Nigeria : "Wealth Clinic Yaba".


Other perks include shout outs on Facebook, linkedin & Twitter and a personal thank you call & signed letter from Pastor Kunle for your support.


If you donate between $1,000 and $5,000 we will feature you (complete with photograph, a brief bio and our appreciation shout out) in the special edition of our "Eternal Wealth Journal" to be released online and in prints in all 7 (seven) countries earlier mentioned by december 2016.


For donors, making contributions of $10,000 or more, Prioriity.com will give you a full year's worth of the "Executive Prioriity" membership, free of charge, with the CEO, (whoever that might be per time), being your personal consultant.


Above all, the covenant of wealth which this ministry operates under, which guarantees that ALL who help us shall find help too, will be activated on behalf of every donor during our extra-ordinary partners prayer event slated for the second week in october, to be streamed, live.


Legal Status.
The Global Wealth Project is special Purpose vehicle (SPV) created by City With Foundations Ministry, a legal non-profit registered as an incorporated trustee in 2009 under part "C" of the company and allied matters Act of Nigeria.


Final Word

One thing i'm sure of, is that you will be proud of our work and its impact and you will be glad you invested iñ us. PLEASE SHARE THIS CAMPAIGN WITH YOUR NETWORK. God bless you and thank you very much for your support.

PLEASE SHARE THIS CAMPAIGN WITH YOUR NETWORK. God bless you and thank you very much for your support.

story:
Campaign ended - we will try again with new energy and force!

Thank you!



We have three tools that we, boldly, believe will be as valuable as Wikipedia.

"Wikideas", "Understanding" and "Comment changer - stop the hate"

This is a communication platform that will reduce hate, radicalization and polarization by using the latest knowledge in psychology and communication. 

SVENSK VERSION HÄR (Swedish version)


You want to do good right? That feeling when you help someone? 
What if you could do it all the time whenever you want?

We want to make it EASY, FUN and ENGAGING to make the world a little better place!

BACKGROUND - NOW OR NEVER

We have not changed enough to prevent a WW3

I’m worried about a rising tension in the world and we see tragic events one after another. The tension is similar to WW2.
Left vs Right are fighting. Racists vs non-racists. Truth vs lies. Terrorist vs the people. Goverment vs the people. Corporations vs the people.

We must act now and spread understanding between these groups! 
Spread peace! Spread respect!

Also secure the right to free speech in times like these.

 “I don’t fear any feelings, ideas or thoughts - I only the fear of those who are not trying to understand them." -Captain Free

As you saw in the video when I chased the thief, I didn't judge him for stealing,     I kept my respect for him. I asked questions. I tried to understand his situation.
Did you see how he started to change?

We are all "evil" and "good", no one is just one of those.

He has been labeled forever, and when someone finally removes that label, he also removes it from himself. When someone finally see his suffering, he take off his armor and become vulnerable and open for change.

If we can't be vulnerable - we build armor and weapons.

This campaign is important not only for us, but for the future of our kids.



PROBLEM RIGHT NOW:

(Everyone is blindfolded and is trying to see the elephant by just looking or touching at one part - you can't get the whole picture)

TOOL 1 - Understanding

The most important thing right now is to have our ideas challenged with respect.

This tool can and will be used against radicalization and hate.
We have to REWARD people for testing their and try new perspective.
NOT punish them and call them "Evil" or "Bad".

The tools will be available in the browser and will eventually become available as an app.

WHY IT'S NEEDED:

WHY YOU WILL LOVE IT:

  • A site where no one will bully you in a debate - they will all try to understand you
  • Be heard, understood, respected, accepted and acknowledged no matter what you think.
  • Make the world a better place whenever you want by trying to understand!

Since we spend more time on the internet, and not debating in real life, we have to create a platform where we can communicate properly and discuss ideas. It’s not about accepting different opinions, but respecting the individual behind it.
 
The current forums are not designed for debate:
Twitter, comment section or forums.

They are needed, but we need to add something else. Where you communicate with one person. In a safe and non-judgemental-zone with people who can guide your debate. All done in a tool, designed like a game with the latest knowledge in communication and psychology.



We know it works because it's based upon "non-violent-communication" which is a proven successful way for understanding each other with thousands of practitioners worldwide.

Uniqueness

  • Live
  • Debate about a topic OR explore one person's idea (racist, terrorist or X)
  • Three communicators – A, B and C (active observers)
  • Three phases for each debate - Question phase, perspective phase and open phase (and many more)
  • Emotional+rational thinking
  • In a non-political-correct & non-judgemental-zone


HOW IT WORKS

Subject chosen – you are matched with up with another communicator and observers. You go through the different phases. The aim is not to “win” a debate, it’s to get the most understanding points.

GOAL: Understanding between groups, people and ideas.


EFFECT

  • Less hate

  • More understanding

  • More peace

  • More respect

  • More love

  • Truth will be prevail

I'm 100% sure it can prevent a violent conflict, maybe even the lead up to murder and even mass shootings.


TOOL 2: COMMENT CHANGER - STOP THE HATE (stretch goal):

Thousands of comments are publicized every second. In the newspaper you can almost read daily about someone being hurt by hate. And it can be directed towards anyone.

Some even decide to take their life because of net bullying and hate.

The tool "Understanding" is a long-term and proactive solution.
                                         This is a short-term and reactive solution.

We believe it has to do with being irrational, too easy to comment, frustration and a form of ventilation from one's own problem.

So we wish to create a sort of eco system with comments.
You can either FIND comments and clarify them. Or you can take your OWN comment and turn into a constructive comment.




(Just an example)




TOOL 3: "Wikideas" (stretch goal)

"Turn the information alive and craft ideas"

“If you think your poverty is God's will, you pray. 
  If you think your poverty is the result of your own inadequacy,you shrink into despair. And if you think your poverty is the result of oppression and domination, then you rise up in revolt.”

Are you a Truth seeker?

We just made the tool which Socrates, revolutionaries and any one with ideas to set the world free only could have dreamed of!

Conspiracy or not? This platform will help you with that matter!
Around the globe we see people questioning things. That's great, but we need a platform to help people with that.

Ideas is the basis of everything created and acted upon. In times where there are many ideas and being discussed, it's hard to get an overview. They constantly change and evolve. In times where our memory and attention has lowered, why not ask for some help?

Together with your friends or group, build a map with all the information, perspective, ideas and arguments. Deny sources or test your own bias. Together you will eventually come up with the Truth.

It's a journey and who knows, maybe the earth is flat....?

WHY YOU WILL LOVE IT:

-Save arguments - no more forgetting
-Create a map with all your arguments with a complete overview
-Collaborate and explore ideas together
-Examine arguments and deny their existence forever


(I take immigration as topic since it is discussed everywhere right now)


GOAL: Find and explore our ideas for the possibility of changing them
Wikideas will help us deny false ideas, understand other ideas and maybe change our ideas. Together or alone, you will be able to build your own world of ideas and decorate it with arguments, perspective and so forth.

With this tool bad ideas will more likely be denied when you actually see how it looks on paper, in combination with "Understanding" which helps you to explore ideas and debate them in a safe environment.


GALLERY WITH CONCEPT IMAGES AND OTHER



FUNDINGS:

"UNDERSTANDING" TOOL: 35,000$

We aim to have the languages English and Swedish for the start. The functions will be adjusted as the website is built and we can see how much time and money we can put in every important feature. As much as I want to give a highly detailed picture, it's hard to predict the cost in a custom built work.

This funding will ensure a streamlined concept and fully functioning website with the most important functions and features, ready to make the world a better place with you!  I don't want to push the funding. It's better to reach your goal than not.

STRETCH GOAL: 55,000$
"COMMENT CHANGER - STOP THE HATE

*And more functions to the platform and "Understanding"


WOW! A stretch goal, imagine if it becomes a reality! This is a really important idea in times like these were communication has become quick, anonymous and sometimes filled with hate. All money above 35,000$ will make the platform stronger and better.


STRETCH GOAL:80,000$
"WIKIDEAS"

This tool fits perfectly with the first one (Understanding). With 80,000$ we will be able to make all tools work flawlessly with the platform from start to end. As much as I would like to give you a super detailed budget, the cost is hard to predict.


WHO AM I? CAN YOU TRUST ME?

I can only give you information to let you form your opinion. I value trust as the most important thing in times like these. The organization/platform will be run like a sort of e-democracy with openness and transparency as its main priority.

In my past I have worked for 4 organizations as a volunteer, abroad and in Sweden.
I been in a Social Entrepreneur challenge and made it to phase 3, past 1000 of entrepreneurs with another idea called "Life tools".

Here you can listen to me when I'm interviewed on National radio (Swedish)

(ME - Robin - and the Captain Free car)

Cost will involve;


Project length;

Around 6 months

Why is your project worth viewers’ hard-earned dollars?

We truly value your hard-earned dollars and will handle them with utter most care. We always look for the option that gives most value for the money and in my personal life - saving is a sport.

Development and insight;

We like projects where you get an insight in what’s going on, and I will promise you that you will have a video every month. You will meet the programmers, problems, solutions and reflections and thoughts about the project.


FAQ:

"Is it non-profit?"

It will be run as a non-profit and ALL the money will be re-invested. This will be shown by us at the yearly report.

"Why is it not run in a non-profit?"

We were not enough persons and it had some requirements. At Indiegogo you can only be a non-profit from USA at the moment.

"Will you turn it into a non-profit?"

It is non-profit, just not a non-profit-organization. But yes we will!

What if you don't reach your goal?

If we fail, we will take the full responsibility for not being able to explain the ideas well enough. Therefore we would use the money we received and improve our concept images, alternative, start in a really small scale, and try again.



Read more about the movement

OUR WEBSITE IS:
www.peloun.se

*I am currently unemployed, so i could only pay some for the graphic, but had to do the most by myself. Thanks for your Understanding ;)*
story_txt:
Campaign ended - we will try again with new energy and force!Thank you!We have three tools that we, boldly, believe will be as valuable as Wikipedia.
"Wikideas", "Understanding" and "Comment changer - stop the hate"This is a communication platform that will reduce hate, radicalization and polarization by using the latest knowledge in psychology and communication.  SVENSK VERSION HÄR (Swedish version) 




You want to do good right? That feeling when you help someone? What if you could do it all the time whenever you want?
We want to make it EASY, FUN and ENGAGING to make the world a little better place!

BACKGROUND - NOW OR NEVER
We have not changed enough to prevent a WW3
I’m worried
about a rising tension in the world and we see tragic events one after another. The tension is similar to WW2.
Left vs Right are fighting. Racists vs non-racists. Truth vs lies. 
Terrorist vs the people. Goverment vs the people. Corporations vs the 
people. 

We must act
now and spread understanding between these groups! Spread peace! Spread respect! 

Also secure the right to free speech in times like these.
 “I don’t fear any feelings, ideas or thoughts -
I only the fear of those who are not trying to understand them." -Captain Free


As you saw in the video when I chased the thief, I didn't judge him for stealing,     I kept my respect for him. I asked questions. I tried to understand his situation.  Did you see how he started to change? 
We are all "evil" and "good", no one is just one of those.
He has been labeled forever, and when someone finally removes that label, he also removes it from himself. When someone finally see his suffering, he take off his armor and become vulnerable and open for change.
If we can't be vulnerable - we build armor and weapons.


This campaign is important not only for us, but for the future of our kids.

PROBLEM RIGHT NOW:


(Everyone is blindfolded and is trying to see the elephant by just looking or touching at one part - you can't get the whole picture)



TOOL 1 - Understanding



The most important thing right now is to have our ideas challenged with respect. This tool can and will be used against radicalization and hate.We have to REWARD people for testing their and try new perspective. NOT punish them and call them "Evil" or "Bad".The tools will be available in the browser and will eventually become available as an app.
WHY IT'S NEEDED:




WHY YOU WILL LOVE IT:

A site where no one will bully you in a debate - they will all try to understand you


Be heard, understood, respected, accepted and acknowledged no matter what you think. 
Make the world a better place whenever you want by trying to understand!

Since we spend more time on the internet, and not debating in real life, we have to create a platform where we can communicate properly and discuss ideas. It’s not about accepting different opinions, but respecting the individual
behind it.  The current forums are not designed for debate: Twitter, comment section or forums. They are needed, but we need to add something else. Where you communicate with one person. In a safe and non-judgemental-zone with people who can guide your debate. All done in a tool, designed like a game with the latest knowledge in communication and psychology.
We know it works because it's based upon "non-violent-communication" which is a proven successful way for understanding each other with thousands of practitioners worldwide.



Uniqueness

Live
Debate about a topic OR explore one person's idea (racist, terrorist or X)

Three communicators – A, B and C (active observers)

Three phases for each debate - Question phase, perspective phase and open phase (and many more)

Emotional+rational thinking

In a non-political-correct & non-judgemental-zone



HOW IT WORKS
Subject chosen – you are matched with up with another communicator and observers. You go through the different phases. The aim is not to “win” a debate, it’s to get the most understanding points. 
GOAL: Understanding between groups, people and ideas.





EFFECT


Less hate
More understanding
More peace
More respect
More love
Truth will be prevail

I'm 100% sure it can prevent a violent conflict, maybe even the lead up to murder and even mass shootings.
TOOL 2: COMMENT CHANGER - STOP THE HATE (stretch goal): 

Thousands of comments are publicized every second. In the newspaper you can almost read daily about someone being hurt by hate. And it can be directed towards anyone.
Some even decide to take their life because of net bullying and hate. 
The tool "Understanding" is a long-term and proactive solution.                                          This is a short-term and reactive solution.
We believe it has to do with being irrational, too easy to comment, frustration and a form of ventilation from one's own problem.
So we wish to create a sort of eco system with comments.You can either FIND comments and clarify them. Or you can take your OWN comment and turn into a constructive comment.







(Just an example)


TOOL 3: "Wikideas" (stretch goal)
"Turn the information alive and craft ideas"
“If you think your poverty is God's will, you pray.   If you think 
your poverty is the result of your own inadequacy,you shrink into 
despair. And if you think your poverty is the result of oppression and 
domination, then you rise up in revolt.”

Are you a Truth seeker? 
We just
made the tool which Socrates, revolutionaries and any one with ideas to set the
world free only could have dreamed of!
Conspiracy or not? This platform will help you with that matter! Around the globe we see people questioning things. That's great, but we need a platform to help people with that.
Ideas is the basis of everything created and acted upon. In times where 
there are many ideas and being discussed, it's hard to get an overview. 
They constantly change and evolve. In times where our memory and 
attention has lowered, why not ask for some help?

Together with your friends or group, build a map with all the information, perspective, ideas and arguments. Deny 
sources or test your own bias. Together you will eventually come up
 with the Truth. 

It's a journey and who knows, maybe the earth is flat....?
WHY YOU WILL LOVE IT:
-Save arguments - no more forgetting-Create a map with all your arguments with a complete overview-Collaborate and explore ideas together-Examine arguments and deny their existence forever
(I take immigration as topic since it is discussed everywhere right now)
GOAL: Find and explore our ideas for the possibility of changing themWikideas will help us deny false ideas, understand other ideas and maybe change our ideas. Together or alone, you will be able to build your own world of ideas and decorate it with arguments, perspective and so forth.With this tool bad ideas will more likely be denied when you actually see how it looks on paper, in combination with "Understanding" which helps you to explore ideas and debate them in a safe environment.GALLERY WITH CONCEPT IMAGES AND OTHER









FUNDINGS: 

"UNDERSTANDING" TOOL: 35,000$
We aim to have the languages English and Swedish for the start. The functions will be adjusted as the website is built and we can see how much time and money we can put in every important feature. As much as I want to give a highly detailed picture, it's hard to predict the cost in a custom built work.
This funding will ensure a streamlined concept and fully functioning website with the most important functions and features, ready to make the world a better place with you!  I don't want to push the funding. It's better to reach 
your goal than not. 
STRETCH GOAL: 55,000$"COMMENT CHANGER - STOP THE HATE

*And more functions to the platform and "Understanding"
WOW! A stretch goal, imagine if it becomes a reality! This is a really important idea in times like these were communication has become quick, anonymous and sometimes filled with hate. All money above 35,000$ will make the platform stronger and better. 

STRETCH GOAL:80,000$"WIKIDEAS"

This tool fits perfectly with the first one (Understanding). With 80,000$ we will be able to make all tools work flawlessly with the platform from start to end. As much as I would like to give you a super detailed budget, the cost is hard to predict. 

WHO AM I? CAN YOU TRUST ME?I can only give you information to 
let you form your opinion. I value trust as the most important thing in 
times like these. The organization/platform will be run like a sort of 
e-democracy with openness and transparency as its main 
priority. In my past I have worked for 4 organizations as a volunteer, abroad and in Sweden.I been in a Social Entrepreneur challenge and made it to phase 3, past 1000 of entrepreneurs with another idea called "Life tools".Here you can listen to me when I'm interviewed on National radio (Swedish)(ME - Robin - and the Captain Free car)


Cost will
involve;


Project
length;
Around 6
months
Why is your project worth viewers’ hard-earned
dollars?
We truly value your hard-earned dollars and will handle
them with utter most care. We always look for the option that gives most value for the money and in my
personal life - saving is a sport.
Development and insight;
We like projects where you get an insight in what’s
going on, and I will promise you that you will have a video every month. You will meet the
programmers, problems, solutions and reflections and thoughts about the
project.

FAQ:
"Is it non-profit?"
It will be run as a non-profit and ALL the money will be re-invested. This will be shown by us at the yearly report.
"Why is it not run in a non-profit?"
We were not enough persons and it had some requirements. At Indiegogo you can only be a non-profit from USA at the moment.
"Will you turn it into a non-profit?"
It is non-profit, just not a non-profit-organization. But yes we will!
What if you don't reach your goal?
If we fail, we will take the full responsibility for not being able to explain the ideas well enough. Therefore we would use the money we received and improve our concept images, alternative, start in a really small scale, and try again.



Read more about the movement
OUR WEBSITE IS:www.peloun.se

but had to do the most by myself. Thanks for your Understanding ;)*

story:
MyLanguage.Pro will be a new website attracting only the highest quality qualified and experienced tutors, thereby guaranteeing students a higher quality learning experience and better results. 

The Current Problems:

Current online websites do not verify teachers qualifications sufficiently. This leads to students having little control over the standard of teaching.

In addition tutors are charged an exorbitant commission (15% by the larger providers). This leads to the best tutors leaving current websites and both new students being unable to find them, whilst simultaneously these tutors being unable to find new students!

The Solution:

MyLanguage.Pro will solve these problems and serve both students and tutors better by:

  • Lowering the commission charged by major sites from 15% to 4.85% (ie less than 1/3 of current commissions). This will encourage the best tutors to migrate to MyLanguage.Pro and make them far more likely to remain as they will receive quality reviews generating more students.
  • Vetting both the quality and quality of teachers more thoroughly:
    • Checking the existence of schools to make sure they exist
    • Requiring that qualifications are verifiable
    • Requiring that tutors migrating from other sites have the highest ratings possible on these other sites from students, guaranteeing lesson quality.

The Result:

  • Students will be happier with the teaching results thereby leaving higher quality reviews.
  • This will encourage more potential students to have greater faith in booking a tutor, thereby serving tutors better.
  • This will encourage tutors to stay on the site, thereby further encouraging students to trust the reputation of this site and visit it.

In this way a virtuous cycle is created. Both students and tutors are happier, increasing the brand power of the MyLanguage.Pro. More tutors continue to be attracted by the better incentive and therefore can serve more students who are served better than on other sites, further engaging to religion of MyLanguage.Pro. 

My Experience:

I am both a teacher and a student on these sites and I recognise that both groups could be served with much greater satisfaction for much less cost.

I also have a Master in Business Administration, with over 20 years experience in advising in and setting up new businesses, including web based businesses.

Your Contributions: 

Your contributions will go directly to developing the website portal, setting up the company structure and initial online marketing costs. Your contributions will make it possible to establish a website that provides higher quality tutors that takes far lower commissions.

What You Get:

I recognise that incentives must be what you want for the site to work. My incentives serve both students and tutors.

The incentives will discount lessons on the site. Large pledges will offer express assessment for potential tutors. 

How Pledges will be Spent:

  • Website development costs: €1200
  • Website domain and hosting costs: €180
  • Online marketing costs: €2500
  • Photography for website and promotional video: €650
  • Company set-up costs  in Hong Kong: € 950
  • Crowdfunding site costs: €603
  • Crowdfunding reserved funds (to also be used for online marketing when released): €274
  • Crowdfunding Transfer fee:€25

Total = €6382

Also, note - if we don’t reach our funding goals then the funding will be used in the following order:

  • The crowdfunding site costs
  • Domain costs
  • Website development costs,
  • Then company setup costs,
  • Online marketing costs

Of course all contributions will be deeply appreciated. Any amount will help us achieve our goal in providing the highest quality online language leaning site in the world. 

Other Ways to Help:

We’d also love it if you could spread the word to your friends and colleagues who may be able to help. 

The Risks and Challenges:

The risks are:

  • That the website is not developed quickly and correctly: I have a developer with a very good reputation for delivery. Their ratings are public, so I have great faith in their ability to deliver. I have developed a number of websites previously and am familiar with how to choose a good developer, as well as how to work with them to achieve the desired result. 
  • Marketing costs insufficient: similar projects in the past have had very similar online marketing costs. As more students are attracted to the site, some of that revenue will be used to fund ongoing online marketing. 
  • Attracting teachers to the site: with a commission for tutors of less than 1/3 of the major sites at present, tutors will want to use the site. 
  • Attracting students to the site: as we will only accept tutors with verified qualifications and high satisfaction ratings, students will be on average, much more satisfied. They will be much more likely to stay on the site.

story:
Resume

85% of effectiveness in leadership is determined by the emotional coefficient of the person and only 15% by the IQ.

Latin America constantly struggles with problems such as extreme poverty, violence, lack of opportunities, but mainly suffers the absence of true leaders who transform society.

Neuroscience has shown that the main reason for absence of transforming leaders of society is the lack of a home-school-society system that allows the development of emotional intelligence.

The educational systems of most Latin countries have not included in their teaching programs the development of competences derived from a job in the "human being" and the existing programs have mostly high prices that exclude those who do not have that value to opt for them.

Reprogramming your brain for success is a virtual learning program with the main objective of developing powerful soft skills derived from the work in the emotional intelligence in the participants, unleashing with it the potential and the power that gives a correct process of our thoughts, emotions and mental programs, achieving with this the development in the participant of competences such as:

  • self-confidence,
  • emotional self-control,
  • a healthy and powerful attitude,
  • increase in energy and vitality,
  • empathy,
  • spirit of service,
  • capacity to create relationships effective interpersonal,
  • team spirit 
  • a transforming leadership that is capable of generating changes in the environment in which it operates.

The program will have 6 modules of two months each, in which videos, audio, valuable content, self-evaluations, practical application exercises, introspection exercises, forums and support will be provided.

The modules to be covered will be:

  • Discovering and conquering the power of your mind:  In this module the participant will know the factors that configure the behavior and power of thoughts in the results of life, discovering that the only change that can control is the one that generates in his own mind. We will carry out a journey through the unconscious, removing all those mental programs that are affecting effective performance, limiting the development of the full potential.
    We will carry out a deep journey towards the discovery of ourselves using the knowledge provided by the neurosciences.
  • Taking control of your emotions: The emotional intelligence consists in the knowledge and control of our emotions and the interpretation of the emotions of other people with what we achieve effective interpersonal relationships, either with our partner, children, authorities and society in general. 
  • From chicken to eagle. Learning  to walk in excellence: The path of excellence involves the reprogramming of aspects such as the correct management of our time, the discovery of our competencies and weaknesses and the strategy management of the achievement of our goals, to convert our desires into objectives accompanied by an effective plan of realization.We will work in the discovery of talents, vocation and passion and in the realization of a strategic plan of life. 
  • Programming your mind to prosperity: The mind of the Latino has many mental programs that take him away from true prosperity. In this module we will work on these programs of scarcity and poverty to transform them into adequate programs that allow a path of true prosperity.On the one hand there is the poverty derived from corruption but on the other hand the poverty of generational patterns that do not allow young people to successfully undertake real prosperity.
  • Transformer Leadership. Convirting you in the protagonist of the change in your life and your nation: And in this module we reach the goal of greater weight, to make the participant the protagonist of change in society. The participant will discover that in his hands is the power to change society, leaving to look responsible in government, in poverty, in his boss, in his parents ... taking him to take the reins of his future assuming his responsibility in the transformation of its environment. 
  • Activating your life energy to transform your life and your environment: All changes require a double dose of energy, however there is very little that people dominate over the creation of vital energy. This module will provide the tools and knowledge necessary to take the participant to the generation of greater and more powerful levels of vital energy. 

The goal is to reach 150,000 young people and young adults from Honduras, which represents 1 dollar per participant, 1 dollar that will transform the life of the participant, their environment and their future generations.

To make this project a reality, we need $175,000  that will be used to:

  • Design and creation of the digital platform for the 12-months virtual program 
  • Educational platform with capacity to serve the 150,000 young people who will be reached
  • Creation of training videos
  • Creation of online digital diagnosis auto-evaluations
  • Creation of valuable content for the participants
  • Professional support for participants
  • Technological equipment  and softwares for the design and creation of the virtual program Program
  • Promotion costs
  • Registration costs and administration of participants

Costs for the follow-up of the participants All this represents $ 1.17 per participant.

The impact

Honduras is a country with high rates of poverty, high rates of violence and a huge inequality gap between the opportunities that can be achieved. If the problem of the lack of programs that develop high emotional intelligence in people living in developed countries is present imagine how serious it is in our country.

The program will transform 150,000 lives that in turn will transform their homes, their jobs, their businesses and society in general, generating changes in future generations and reducing the scourges of poverty and violence in our country.

By supporting our project, your name, brand or company will be positioned in the minds and hearts of each of the 150,000 participants and you will be the protagonist of an authentic change in the future generations of our country.

story:
What is your campaign about? 

My campaign is aimed at raising capital for my studies at the William Studio in New York.

Indicate the amount of funding that you are applying for?

4000 us dollars

Why the amount?

The amount will cover the tuition fees for two years which is 2000 dollars a year and assist with living expenses

Is this your only initiative?

No, I have applied to several funding organizations and am currently savings towards my studies.  

If you don’t meet your target what impact does this have for you?

I will not be able to study at the Studio. My savings do not cover most of my expenses.

Currently the exchange is not favorable for Kenya, 1 dollar = 104 KES

 

Give reasons why you should be funded instead of other campaigns

Initially when I started the campaign my focus was on my needs and what I wanted to achieve, however as I began to appeal for assistance on social media the positive responses have taught me about community, shared ideas, reciprocity and inspiration. There is a community of people who want you to succeed and have taught me about paying it forward. This has made me offer more service to others. I fund campaigns that are focused on personal development. I have learnt the need for a strong team to share ideas and build a strong brand. Not all strategies are going to be successful and a team of people sharing ideas can help realign your strategies. Reciprocity has been the biggest lesson I have learnt. In order to receive you have to give, and giving comes in all forms. In order to succeed you have to create mutually beneficial relationships. I have been humbled and inspired by all the shares my campaign has received thus far and this has only made me work harder to achieve my goal. For an ordinary Kenya female to be able to study abroad will have a chain effect in inspiring others to overcome their fears and follow their dreams. In order to inspire others you have to walk the walk and talk the talk and I believe I can achieve that.  Starting this campaign has definitely made me a better person and I’m constantly looking for ways to align my strategies with being of service to others. By the end of this campaign I hope to learn how to be better at paying it forward to others.

How will you pay it forward

My goal it to be able to open a drama studio at the The Royal Almasi Christian School in Kenya.  The school is close to my heart because I attended this school as a little girl and all our drama events took place at a community hall which was later burnt down. 

 

Give us any other additional information that you may want to bring to our attention

My perks include the donation of my time and service to the Naiobi School in Nairobi and service to a non-profit theater organization for kids.  Pictures and video clips of  will be posted. Should you not be in a position to financially support my campaign however you would like to assist please share the post with your network . Any effort will be graciously received.
story_txt: What is your campaign about? My campaign is aimed at raising capital for my studies at the William Studio in New York.Indicate the amount of funding that you are applying for?4000 us dollarsWhy the amount?The amount will cover the tuition fees for two years which is 2000 dollars a year and assist with living expensesIs this your only initiative?No, I have applied to several funding organizations and am currently savings towards my studies.  If you don’t meet your target what impact does this have for you?I will not be able to study at the Studio. My savings do not cover most of my expenses.Currently the exchange is not favorable for Kenya, 1 dollar = 104 KES Give reasons why you should be funded instead of other campaignsInitially when I started the campaign my focus was on my needs and what I wanted to achieve, however as I began to appeal for assistance on social media the positive responses have taught me about community, shared ideas, reciprocity and inspiration. There is a community of people who want you to succeed and have taught me about paying it forward. This has made me offer more service to others. I fund campaigns that are focused on personal development. I have learnt the need for a strong team to share ideas and build a strong brand. Not all strategies are going to be successful and a team of people sharing ideas can help realign your strategies. Reciprocity has been the biggest lesson I have learnt. In order to receive you have to give, and giving comes in all forms. In order to succeed you have to create mutually beneficial relationships. I have been humbled and inspired by all the shares my campaign has received thus far and this has only made me work harder to achieve my goal. For an ordinary Kenya female to be able to study abroad will have a chain effect in inspiring others to overcome their fears and follow their dreams. In order to inspire others you have to walk the walk and talk the talk and I believe I can achieve that.  Starting this campaign has definitely made me a better person and I’m constantly looking for ways to align my strategies with being of service to others. By the end of this campaign I hope to learn how to be better at paying it forward to others.How will you pay it forwardMy goal it to be able to open a drama studio at the The Royal Almasi Christian School in Kenya.  The school is close to my heart because I attended this school as a little girl and all our drama events took place at a community hall which was later burnt down.  Give us any other additional information that you may want to bring to our attentionMy perks include the donation of my time and service to the Naiobi School in Nairobi and service to a non-profit theater organization for kids.  Pictures and video clips of  will be posted. Should you not be in a position to financially support my campaign however you would like to assist please share the post with your network . Any effort will be graciously received.

story:
Zero-screen time coding!

Buildy Bots coding board uses short-distance wireless technology(NFC) paired with coding blocks. This means coding can happen, without a computer or device! 

Each block represents an action that when placed in sequential order, will create simple to complex programs. Best of all, the blocks use pictures so coding can happen without reading.

 

Buildy Bots Ages Up With Your Child

Starting at age 5, children can build simple machines, but as their fine motor skills develop, Buildy Bots will grow up with them! Build remote controlled robots, code sensors, and collaborate on new inventions! 

Easy Assembly

While Buildy Bots is the perfect toy for play and exploration, it also comes with an assembly manual and curriculum to guide your child with fun activities using the coding blocks. 

 Building Designed For Kids

Buildy Bots makes building easy for kids. Solid frames and smooth edges are designed for small hands to grip. Nuts and bolts lock with ease for seamless assembly. All parts and tools included in the kits are shaped for a child’s hands to grip. 

Simple Motors & Sensors

Play music, light up LEDs, sense objects, and move. Motors and sensors connect easily with no extra tools needed for assembly. 

Remote Control

No need to code right away. The remote control lets the young builder drive their creation before learning to code.

About Buildy Bots

First imagined as UARO (Kid Robot) by RoboRobo, it was the first hands-on coding toy in South Korea. By creating an off-the-computer coding device, young children could build their creativity, hone their fine-motor skills, learn physical computing, and develop 21st century skills, all while playing.

For its North American debut, RoboRobo has partnered with Robolink, inc., renaming UARO to Buildy Bots, because this kit is perfect for little hands to build lots of robots!

Hardware and Curriculum

Buildy Bots hardware and curriculum has been remastered by Robolink to create a series of kits that blends open play and exploration, with structured learning. Each kit brings new hardware, technology, and challenges, all designed to grow with the child.

Buildy Bots Add-Ons

These add-ons are a great way to get the most out of your Buildy Bots!

This Expansion Kit let's your kiddo build on their own unique creations with more wheels, motor, structural parts, and battery case.

 Expansion Kit $50

Storage Cube $30

This will help you keep Buildy Bots organized!

Shipping

Due to inflated shipping costs, shipping, VAT, and taxes will be calculated and billed at the end of the campaign, when we expect prices to decrease. 

About Robolink

Robolink was established in 2012 in San Diego, California to encourage students to engage with STEM. Our mission is to make STEM education accessible, engaging, and fun. The world is becoming more technology-driven, so it’s increasingly important that we cultivate the next generation of innovators and inventors and make technology accessible to all. We were the first to make a programmable educational drone as well as a self-driving car kit that teaches artificial intelligence.

Risks and challenges

Most of the risks and challenges are behind us. We have completed three successful Kickstarter projects (CoDrone, Zumi, and Rokit Smart,). Our team of educational specialists poured their lives into designing these kits and have been a huge success in Korea. Throughout the testing phase, we worked to perfect the kits based on the feedback of the users. These users had a blast working with our prototypes and were able to create some absolutely incredible robots. And now, Buildy Bots is ready for you. It's for boys and girls, ages 5-10, and all it's going to take is your support.

At this point, there is just two hurdles left:

Production: Many of the parts in this kit and curriculum are localized. We have very exacting standards, so creating the molds and manufacturing the components can be very expensive. Thankfully, we have identified some top-tier factory partners who can produce our kits with a very quick turnaround time.

In order to bring the cost down to an affordable amount, we have to order at least 1,000 kits from the manufacturer. To get there, we are counting on you. Pledge right now and we will put you on the list to be one of the first to receive a Buildy Bots kit so your child can start on their adventure in building and off-the -computer coding!

Shipping Risk: Global shipping and warehousing logistics is mind-boggling. We have been working with our shipping partner for a decade and now that logistics is going back to normal, we are really confident to achieve our goal and ship all backers in time.

Things can still go awry. If they do, we solemnly promise to give you full transparency into the issues and solve them in a way that leaves our backers happy and proud to support our company.

story:
Do You Trust The News Media?

If you don't, then you are not alone.

According to the Edelman Trust Barometer of 2015, 60 percent of the countries surveyed, do not trust media. This study scoped 33,000 people from 27 countries.

Majority of people are starting to close their eyes and ears to the world instead of getting untrusted information. The more concerning side of this, is the people not in doubt, are also the important decision makers in democracies.

A government in a democracy needs public consent to take an action. A power group can push an opinion in our minds to expand its benefits in an unfair way.

In today's society people are not getting the information that they have the right to, addressed by the Universal Declaration of Human Rights Article 19. Freedom of expression is essential to the exercise of all other human rights.

What happens to the world and to us if we do not get the real information?

In the last couple of years there have been lots of public protests in the world. In The USA, The UK, Germany,Turkey, Brazil, Ukraine, Hong Kong... Some of these protests were so crowded that hundreds of thousand people joined and hitted the streets to express their views.

But the problem was, most of these freedom of expression activities had no media coverage.

People tried to spread the information through social media but as people have experienced social media is not a good place to serve news, lacking verification, trust and the valuable information gets stuck in your small influence environment without being seen and systematically archieved.

When a certain event doesn't have the media coverage, it is invisible to the mass population.

If all the people just crowdfunded a new media channel with a very small amount of money, they would have enough coverage, verified information and an informed mass public.

"Control of thought is more important for governments that are free and popular than for despotic and military states. The logic is straightforward: a despotic state can control its domestic enemies by force, but as the state loses this weapon, other devices are required to prevent the ignorant masses from interfering with public affairs, which are none of their business…the public are to be observers, not participants, consumers of ideology as well as products."

Noam Chomsky Force and Opinion (Z Magazine, July-August, 1991)

So the question is; How can we create a better world without knowing what is really happening there?

We need a new news media platform that joins all the existing news sources. Which adapts and evolves with the change of technology, democratizing the news, separating facts and opinions, informing the public independently and freely.

That answer also gave birth to the idea;


Ylitzer - Your Free News

Ylitzer aims to democratize and free the news for everyone, regardless of power groups by publishing news from every source, every angle, every side answering why questions investigating all the evidences through a citizen participated, collaborative, independent online press platform. That can help changing the world for a better future opening our eyes and ears through tranparent news media. A new platform to consume and publish news media without being consumed.

 

How Does It Work?

Main stream media, alternative media, social media, citizen journalism, independent sources and opinions are altogether in one platform.

With Ylitzer you can;

Capture
When you encounter a news, record it by using your smartphone, tablet, camera etc (Enough with the "According to eyewitness accounts, you'll report what you have witnessed" )

Publish
Share your news on Ylitzer. Add your comments. Create or select convenient tags for your news. Publish your news.

Remember all the news shared will be in unverified mode initially!

Verify
Have you encountered the same news published by someone else? Just share your news on Ylitzer under that news. Select either True or False. (Enough with the "How do I know this Twitter account is not talking rubbish?")

Search
Would you like to make a research about a certain news? Just write the news or the tags on the search bar. You will get related news from different locations and times. (Enough with the "Hey I know that guy was talking totally different 2 years ago")

Investigative Journalim
You have a deeper information about a certain news? Just drag and drop the news to "Investigative Journalism" area. You can also add a certain news to the wishlist that you need to be investigated.


Remember! Only YOU can decide which news is really true.


Risks And Challenges
Showing public what really happened and is happening behind the scenes is not easy. Income models for this project would be free of power groups so that it can only be activated by public support. If people turn their back, there is no need to face all those challenges, but the world is aware of the new wave of change is coming. It will happen sometime but sooner it happens, sooner the mother earth and its people will benefit.


Support Ylitzer - Your Free News!
Support and join Ylitzer to free the news, search the truth and question the reasons;  to change the world for a better future.

Be one of the changers embracing the future, being the part of the best story that can change history which you can tell to your happy grandchildren.

It has already began, thanks to all the people believing that we can only change the world altogether.

Support Ylitzer on Indiegogo Now, Free Your News!

  Resources:

Edelman Trust Barometer 2015 - http://www.edelman.com/insights/intellectual-property/2015-edelman-trust-barometer/ 
The Universal Declaration of Human Rights - http://www.un.org/en/documents/udhr/ 
Noam Chomsky - Force and Opinion (Z Magazine, July-August, 1991) -http://www.chomsky.info/articles/199107--.htm 
Ylitzer - "Green and Blue Ball" Video Content 
Song: The 126ers - Water Lily (Youtube Creator Studio Audio Library) 
Video "Gas Prices Are Back On The Rise" Footage: Conan O'Brian Show - Media Montage

story:
About TaikoSource and the Matsuri Database

TaikoSource is dedicated to the development of information resources about taiko, exploring the various mediums within which Japanese taiko drums are used. Free resources at TaikoSource include information about learning taiko, taiko suppliers, building taiko, costuming, taiko groups, workshops and conferences, and a database of taiko songs and resources for learning them.

In our Matsuri Database, we've collected videos and pictures of matsuri-bayashi  (festival music) performances to help archive and educate about this music and the festivals in which they are performed -- some of which have been celebrated for hundreds of years.

With the Matsuri Database, we look to offer a free online database of information and multimedia content relating to matsuri-bayashi performance so that we can both spread knowledge of this music to people outside of Japan and create an archive to ensure this knowledge is preserved for future generations.

The TaikoSource Documentation Project: Tokyo Festivals

The TaikoSource team is currently looking to raise funds for a trip to Tokyo May 4-22, 2015, to document of two of the major festivals in Tokyo: The Kanda Matsuri (May 7-15) and the Sanja Matsuri (May 14-17).

About the Festivals

The Kanda Matsuri is described by the Japan National Tourism Organization as one of "the three largest festivals of Japan." It is held alternately with another festival in Japan, the Sanno Matsuri, with the Kanda Matsuri held in odd-numbered years. This makes this Documentation Trip even more important, as there will not be another opportunity to attend this festival until 2017. The Sanja Matsuri, meanwhile, has been described by hoteltravel.com as "one of the wildest of all Tokyo's festivals." It is known for its processions featuring three large mikoshi (portable shrines). 

A matsuri-bayashi float traveling the streets of Asakusa, Tokyo during the Sanja Matsuri. Picture (c) Benjamin Pachter 2012

Both festivals are known for performances featuring modern descendants of music from the Edo period. The Kanda Matsuri features performances of Kanda-bayashi, while the Sanja Matsuri features performances of Edo-bayashi. This music is regional, found only in the areas in which these festivals are held.

What We Need & What You Get

To make this documentation project a reality, we are looking to raise $5000 to cover basic travel expenses for our team (as well as account for Paypal fees). This campaign is a Fixed Funding campaign, meaning if we don't reach our $5000 goal, you won't have to pay anything. If we pass our goal, any additional funding will go to help expand TaikoSource project options benefiting the whole taiko community. So far we've done a lot with very little, and we'd love the chance to do more!

Perks

As thanks for supporting our campaign, we have some great perks to offer you:
$10: Thanks Page
For contributing $10, your name will be added to a dedicated Thanks page on taikosource.com.
$25: Blog Access
If you contribute $25, you'll receive access to a blog that will be updated before, during, and after the documentation trip. You'll also be listed on our Thanks page. 
$50: Early Access
As a contributor at the $50 level, you'll receive early access to all materials stemming from this documentation project. Not only will you be the first to see the new Matsuri entries about Kanda Matsuri and Sanja Matsuri, but you'll also get early access to the Tokyo Map. 
You'll also receive Blog Access and a listing on the Thanks page. 
$75: Taiko Omiyage
If you contribute $75, our researcher Ben will hand-select a taiko-related omiyage (souvenir), which will be shipped out in June after he returns home. You'll also receive Early Access, Blog Access, and a mention on the Thanks Pages. This is limited to 25 people.
$100: Tokyo Omiyage + Taiko Omiyage
For contributing $100, you'll receive both a Tokyo-related omiyage and a taiko omiyage. In addition, you'll receive Early Access, Blog Access, and a special thanks on the Thanks page. This is limited to 15 people.

    About TaikoSource's Lead Researcher

    Ben Pachter created TaikoSource in 2011 as a resource for the entire taiko community. He is also an ethnomusicologist specializing in taiko performance. Ben received his M.A. and Ph.D. in Ethnomusicology from the University of Pittsburgh, where he wrote both his Master's Thesis and his Dissertation on taiko performance. As part of his research, he has spent time in Tokyo documenting matsuri-bayashi performance and performances by contemporary taiko groups. All of the multimedia data housed in the TaikoSource Matsuri database was gathered during this fieldwork.

    Currently, Ben is a Part-Time Instructor at the University of Pittsburgh, teaching undergraduate Introduction to World Music classes. He's also a taiko player, having co-founded the community group Pittsburgh Taiko in Pittsburgh, PA.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Even if you can't contribute, there are plenty of ways that you can help our campaign! Please get the word out, and help others know about what we're hoping to do! And don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools to help get the word out. 

    Thanks for your help and your support!

performances by contemporary taiko groups. All of the multimedia data 
housed in the TaikoSource Matsuri database was gathered during this 
fieldwork.Currently, Ben is a Part-Time Instructor at the University of 
Pittsburgh, teaching undergraduate Introduction to World Music classes. 
He's also a taiko player, having co-founded the community group 
Pittsburgh Taiko in Pittsburgh, PA.

Other Ways You Can Help


 Even if you can't contribute, there are plenty of ways that you can help our campaign! Please get the word out, and help others know about what we're hoping to do! And don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools to help get the word out. 
Thanks for your help and your support!

story:
About Community 

Pope John Paul II

  our city is considered the 5th most dangerous city in the world and only in 2014 there were 928 homicides of which the vast majority were young we believe the word of God, is the only layers of transforming the lives of young and away from streets.


 And that is why we organized a youth camp that is called : 

risking everything less your soul 
A camp with a duration of 3 days in which our main objective will be evangelize more young people of our community and teach them how beautiful it is our Lord Jesus Christ

What We Need & What You Get

The main problem is that we have not gathered enough money to make the camp, Since we are expecting more than 100 young people that will make the whole camp has a value of:


  •  1000$  Food x 3 days
  •    700$   transport

Of which only we have raised $700 with several activities that we have done as bingo raffles and barbecues

We think the money should not be an impediment to that young people receive the word of God, and this is why we ask for your help in order to be able to carry the word of God to the young people in Honduras that both the need


Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help us by praying for the young people of Honduras and the world


Remember

 Let each man give according as he has determined in his heart, not grudgingly or under compulsion. for God loves a cheerful giver. 2 Corintios 9:7
