story:
A different approach that spells success!

 

I am a Teaching Assistant in a Special Needs school. Some of the pupils I've worked with were failing to learn to read by existing methods. I searched for ways to help them, but none of the phonics methods I looked at were pitched at an extremely low level, which is the only level they could manage. So I have made books designed especially for them and it worked! Now I would like to share it with the world!

 This aids work by providing very clear and simple visual clues. The books include a sliding part, so when a child pulls a lever, the extra letter and the picture illustrating new meaning slide out before his/her eyes.

I think these aids can be very useful for children with learning disabilities and non-native English speakers. 

I need to raise £5000 to print 500 sets. Out of them, 400 sets will be distributed for free at schools for special needs children. For donations of over $35 I can also send you a set of these books.

Your contributions and efforts to spread the word will be much appreciated!

Let's make a difference!

 



Clearing the Confusion in Phonics for SEN Pupils

A testimonial for resources designed by Ms. Irina Litovcenko.

I am writing to commend to you a series of prompts especially designed to progress SEN students in phonics at Key Stage 3.

Recent trends in schools towards “synthetic phonics” with it’s inherent rigidity, together with other new and even traditional phonics teaching, while of clear benefit to more able pupils, has been observed to cause significant anxiety and stress in the case of many SEN pupils to the extent where their whole learning experience is affected.

The development of new teaching methods is of course an intrinsic component in the development of Education as a whole. However, where schools and SEN schools in particular are unable to decouple old or integrate new systems effectively, the resulting hybridisation often results in confusion for those pupils not quite on the cusp of phonics comprehension.

As a practitioner of long standing, teaching throughout the SEN realm, I have in recent years along with other professionals in this field, become increasingly frustrated at the lack of resources available to bridge the potential gaps outlined above. 

During this past year I have had the good fortune to be a participant in using of a set of prompts designed specifically to overcome many of the pupil-perceived hurdles in the teaching of SEN phonics.

Ms. Litovcenko has produced a set of ingenious but simple slides which cover both the most common phonemes and those that are the most difficult for pupils with learning disabilities to understand. Whilst the process is easy for practitioners like myself to deal with in concept and operation, more importantly, pupils presenting difficulties in learning phonics are able to grasp the purpose of the slides and within a short time progression is readily evidenced.

Since using these resources in everyday practice I have been able to report improvement in the majority of pupils to one whole NC level in one term with 2 sub-levels achieved by the rest.

I am commending Ms Litovcenko’s simple but superb system to you because it works and in my view it is worthy of publishing.

You will I am sure appreciate that professional presentation of these slides would be prohibitively expensive without the graphics expertise of a publishing house such as yours. However, I am convinced having used them and seen the results at first hand that these resources in the right package would do much to clear the confusion, anxiety and inevitable disaffection from the phonics learning experience of SEN pupils nationally.

John Nowak

Senior Teacher (SEN)

story:
The Thought:

International financial market is generalized for profit making; however there are so many aspects to it that one can explore various treads of career. Employment and financial stability can be achieved with it. We will teach not to limit themselves to a part which commonly known or interpreted. One should gets to explore that is never learnt before, giving opportunities to discover, grow and achieve great heights in his/her career.

To help this vision and aspirants going, we team up to give a head start to aspirants and set a path. Our 9+ years of expertise and extensive research will accompany them to achieve wonders.


About Us:

Me and my team is already providing education and also helping people to grow their investments on consistent basis. But we look at this market in a different perspective. I can clearly visualize that it has the potential to solve many questions in our society about the income and unemployment. The plan we've created has the ability to work on professional and social levels.



Education & Research Center

As mentioned before, we designed a unique education program that is based on international financial markets. It will help client in many ways. Below are the mentioned ways that can be beneficial for clients:

1) A unique educational program - This educational program is of 7 months. We will provide training of 8 modules in 12 days of training and then the live practical for rest of the months. This can be attended through online or one on one option. With this program, a client/student will able to start earning within 8 months only and for that, he/she won’t need to make any investment apart from the course fee. The most important thing is, he/she will have five different options to achieve financial stability after the completion of this program. Here is the glimpse of the five options – (i) By doing Job with the International Financial Company (ii) By working online in International Financial Markets. (iii) By working as a freelancer for international customers. (iv) By working with us as a freelancer or employee (v) By working as a faculty at our Education center. This will be the first educational program through which the client will experience a financial stability and will able to overcome the worry of being unemployed.

2) Research center – The most ambitious and reliable research center will study and help to grow wealth and gain financial stability. This will be an institution which will help the students and masses to achieve goals. It will create tremendous opportunities for freelancing and cater to various types of jobs and career paths.


The Impact


International financial market is the vast field of unlimited opportunities. As mentioned earlier, it has a potential of offering quality solutions to complex problems like unemployment in the society. It can offer a good wealth, employment and profit opportunities. Our vision is to combine our vast experience and to offer above mentioned benefits to the largest number of potential customers around the world through our unique program of education.

In short, we will offer a financial market based education that will create a good impact by helping a client to gain a wealth, employment or earning opportunities and a financial stability in his/her life. And in our opinion, this is the need of the hour. Right?


Help a vision become reality… We are looking for funds to create a fully fledged research center and educational center with high quality of infrastructure. This center will be based in Pune, Maharashtra, India.
Your contribution will make it big. It starts with you.

Your contribution will help us to setup below listed details to get started:

1)  Infrastructure

2)  Classroom setup

3)  Marketing Expenses

4)  Operational Costs

5)  Setup and operations of R&D wing

6)  To conduct an international education fair to spread awareness amongst all.


WE NEED YOUR HELP!

If you would like to help us launch our unique educational program and create employment opportunities worldwide, please contribute into this campaign.


HELP SPREAD THE WORD!

After you complete your transaction, Indiegogo will give you the option to send a message to your friends and followers on Facebook and Twitter.

This message will inform your friends that you just backed “A Unique Education Program” and will include a link to our campaign page (http://igg.me/at/exito/x/10537844). Please send these messages! It only takes a second and it'll be a huge help!

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

story:
Short Summary

Pravega is the annual national level college festival of the Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore. As part of the effort to improve science and technical education in the country and to improve the ties of the institute with academia, we are organizing the third edition of this science, technical and cultural festival. School and college students from all over the country participate in this festival each year. The footfall witnessed last year was 12000+.

Pravega consists of science and technical events such as quizzes, hands-on experimental competitions, lectures, fun science events designed and organized by the undergraduate students of IISc along with other cultural events such as dance or drama. This is followed by a professional artist show at the end of the day.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $3000 to organize the festival. We already have around $50000 from various sponsors. Due to potential sponsors pulling out at the last moment we are facing this deficit and we need your help.

We will be generating a post-fest souvenir and will give it to you. In this brochure, we will give a complete overview of what happened in the fest. We will also be giving statistics like amount of footfalls, reach, social media reach etc. and memorable photos such that you can get a feel of the fest.

The Impact

Pravega's main aim is to promote science and research as a career as well as providing a platform for students of various colleges to interact with each other.

We do this by targeting young students enrolled in high schools and colleges and conducting technical competitions and workshops in various areas of science and technology.There are also some cultural events thrown in to lighten the mood and enhance bonding between students. 

This is just the third edition of Pravega and we are already ranked by various websites among the top 10 college fests in India. Pravega is a Sanskrit word meaning 'acceleration' and true to our name we have grown a lot since the past 3 years. We hope to sustain this acceleration for many years to come.

Our previous sponsors include Airbus Group, Microsoft, GE, 3M, Royal Society of Chemistry, Mercedes-Benz, Zeiss, Finolex, Carborundum Universal Ltd.

Risks & Challenges

Since, we expect footfall of 15000-20000 this year, there is a huge logistical and organizational challenge we face. However, we are learning from the mistakes made in the past and we hope to give a better overall performance in organizing the fest this year. With the monetary help you provide, our task is made a little easier

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot render monetary help, please spread the word about Pravega. Liking and sharing our social media posts would be greatly appreciated.
